足球战术模拟器  1.0.1
基于统计的球员行为分类模型

14 namespace TMPro

16  public interface ITextElement
17  {
18  Material sharedMaterial { get; }
19 
20  void Rebuild(CanvasUpdate update);
21  int GetInstanceID();
22  }
23 
24  public enum TextAlignmentOptions
25  {
26  TopLeft = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top,
27  Top = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top,
28  TopRight = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top,
29  TopJustified = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top,
30  TopFlush = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top,
31  TopGeoAligned = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top,
32 
33  Left = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle,
34  Center = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle,
35  Right = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle,
36  Justified = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle,
37  Flush = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle,
38  CenterGeoAligned = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle,
39 
40  BottomLeft = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom,
41  Bottom = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom,
42  BottomRight = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom,
43  BottomJustified = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom,
44  BottomFlush = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom,
45  BottomGeoAligned = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom,
46 
47  BaselineLeft = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline,
48  Baseline = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline,
49  BaselineRight = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline,
50  BaselineJustified = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline,
51  BaselineFlush = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline,
52  BaselineGeoAligned = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline,
53 
54  MidlineLeft = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry,
55  Midline = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry,
56  MidlineRight = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry,
57  MidlineJustified = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry,
58  MidlineFlush = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry,
59  MidlineGeoAligned = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry,
60 
61  CaplineLeft = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline,
62  Capline = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline,
63  CaplineRight = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline,
64  CaplineJustified = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline,
65  CaplineFlush = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline,
66  CaplineGeoAligned = _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry | _VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline
67  };
68 
72  public enum _HorizontalAlignmentOptions
73  {
74  Left = 0x1, Center = 0x2, Right = 0x4, Justified = 0x8, Flush = 0x10, Geometry = 0x20
75  }
76 
80  public enum _VerticalAlignmentOptions
81  {
82  Top = 0x100, Middle = 0x200, Bottom = 0x400, Baseline = 0x800, Geometry = 0x1000, Capline = 0x2000,
83  }

89  public enum TextRenderFlags
90  {
91  DontRender = 0x0,
92  Render = 0xFF
93  };
94 
95  public enum TMP_TextElementType { Character, Sprite };
96  public enum MaskingTypes { MaskOff = 0, MaskHard = 1, MaskSoft = 2 }; //, MaskTex = 4 };
97  public enum TextOverflowModes { Overflow = 0, Ellipsis = 1, Masking = 2, Truncate = 3, ScrollRect = 4, Page = 5, Linked = 6 };
98  public enum MaskingOffsetMode { Percentage = 0, Pixel = 1 };
99  public enum TextureMappingOptions { Character = 0, Line = 1, Paragraph = 2, MatchAspect = 3 };
100 
101  public enum FontStyles { Normal = 0x0, Bold = 0x1, Italic = 0x2, Underline = 0x4, LowerCase = 0x8, UpperCase = 0x10, SmallCaps = 0x20, Strikethrough = 0x40, Superscript = 0x80, Subscript = 0x100, Highlight = 0x200 };
102  public enum FontWeight { Thin = 100, ExtraLight = 200, Light = 300, Regular = 400, Medium = 500, SemiBold = 600, Bold = 700, Heavy = 800, Black = 900 };
103 
107  public abstract class TMP_Text : MaskableGraphic
108  {
112  public string text
113  {
114  get { return m_text; }
115  set { if (m_text == value) return; m_text = old_text = value; m_inputSource = TextInputSources.String; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetLayoutDirty(); }
116  }
117  [SerializeField]
118  [TextArea(5, 10)]
119  protected string m_text;
120 
121 
125  public bool isRightToLeftText
126  {
127  get { return m_isRightToLeft; }
128  set { if (m_isRightToLeft == value) return; m_isRightToLeft = value; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetLayoutDirty(); }
129  }
130  [SerializeField]
131  protected bool m_isRightToLeft = false;
132 
133 
137  public TMP_FontAsset font
138  {
139  get { return m_fontAsset; }
140  set { if (m_fontAsset == value) return; m_fontAsset = value; LoadFontAsset(); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetLayoutDirty(); }
141  }
142  [SerializeField]
143  protected TMP_FontAsset m_fontAsset;
144  protected TMP_FontAsset m_currentFontAsset;
145  protected bool m_isSDFShader;
146 
147 
151  public virtual Material fontSharedMaterial
152  {
153  get { return m_sharedMaterial; }
154  set { if (m_sharedMaterial == value) return; SetSharedMaterial(value); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetMaterialDirty(); }
155  }
156  [SerializeField]
157  protected Material m_sharedMaterial;
158  protected Material m_currentMaterial;
159  protected MaterialReference[] m_materialReferences = new MaterialReference[32];
160  protected Dictionary<int, int> m_materialReferenceIndexLookup = new Dictionary<int, int>();
161 
162  protected TMP_RichTextTagStack<MaterialReference> m_materialReferenceStack = new TMP_RichTextTagStack<MaterialReference>(new MaterialReference[16]);
163  protected int m_currentMaterialIndex;

170  public virtual Material[] fontSharedMaterials
171  {
172  get { return GetSharedMaterials(); }
173  set { SetSharedMaterials(value); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetMaterialDirty(); }
174  }
175  [SerializeField]
176  protected Material[] m_fontSharedMaterials;
177 
178 
182  public Material fontMaterial
183  {
184  // Return an Instance of the current material.
185  get { return GetMaterial(m_sharedMaterial); }
186 
187  // Assign new font material
188  set
189  {
190  if (m_sharedMaterial != null && m_sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID() == value.GetInstanceID()) return;
191 
192  m_sharedMaterial = value;
193 
194  m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial();
195  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
196  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
197 
198  SetVerticesDirty();
199  SetMaterialDirty();
200  }
201  }
202  [SerializeField]
203  protected Material m_fontMaterial;
204 
205 
209  public virtual Material[] fontMaterials
210  {
211  get { return GetMaterials(m_fontSharedMaterials); }
212 
213  set { SetSharedMaterials(value); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetMaterialDirty(); }
214  }
215  [SerializeField]
216  protected Material[] m_fontMaterials;
217 
218  protected bool m_isMaterialDirty;
219 
220 
224  public override Color color
225  {
226  get { return m_fontColor; }
227  set { if (m_fontColor == value) return; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_fontColor = value; SetVerticesDirty(); }
228  }

332  public Color32 faceColor
333  {
334  get
335  {
336  if (m_sharedMaterial == null) return m_faceColor;
337 
338  m_faceColor = m_sharedMaterial.GetColor(ShaderUtilities.ID_FaceColor);
339  return m_faceColor;
340  }
341 
342  set { if (m_faceColor.Compare(value)) return; SetFaceColor(value); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_faceColor = value; SetVerticesDirty(); SetMaterialDirty(); }
343  }
344  [SerializeField]
345  protected Color32 m_faceColor = Color.white;
346

352  {
353  get
354  {
355  if (m_sharedMaterial == null) return m_outlineColor;
356

358  return m_outlineColor;
359  }
360 
361  set { if (m_outlineColor.Compare(value)) return; SetOutlineColor(value); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_outlineColor = value; SetVerticesDirty(); }
362  }

364  protected Color32 m_outlineColor = Color.black;

371  {
372  get
373  {

375 
376  m_outlineWidth = m_sharedMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_OutlineWidth);
377  return m_outlineWidth;
378  }
379  set { if (m_outlineWidth == value) return; SetOutlineThickness(value); m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_outlineWidth = value; SetVerticesDirty(); }
380  }
381  protected float m_outlineWidth = 0.0f;

387  public float fontSize
388  {
389  get { return m_fontSize; }
390  set { if (m_fontSize == value) return; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true; m_fontSize = value; if (!m_enableAutoSizing) m_fontSizeBase = m_fontSize; SetVerticesDirty(); SetLayoutDirty(); }
391  }
392  [SerializeField]
393  protected float m_fontSize = 36; // Font Size
394  protected float m_currentFontSize; // Temporary Font Size affected by tags

412  public FontWeight fontWeight
413  {
414  get { return m_fontWeight; }
415  set { if (m_fontWeight == value) return; m_fontWeight = value; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true; m_isInputParsingRequired = true; SetVerticesDirty(); SetLayoutDirty(); }
416  }
417  [SerializeField]
418  protected FontWeight m_fontWeight = FontWeight.Regular;
419  protected FontWeight m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Regular;
420  protected TMP_RichTextTagStack<FontWeight> m_FontWeightStack = new TMP_RichTextTagStack<FontWeight>(8);
421 
425  public float pixelsPerUnit
426  {
427  get
428  {
429  var localCanvas = canvas;
430  if (!localCanvas)
431  return 1;
432  // For dynamic fonts, ensure we use one pixel per pixel on the screen.
433  if (!font)
434  return localCanvas.scaleFactor;
435  // For non-dynamic fonts, calculate pixels per unit based on specified font size relative to font object's own font size.
436  if (m_currentFontAsset == null || m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize <= 0 || m_fontSize <= 0)
437  return 1;
438  return m_fontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize;
439  }
440  }
441 
442 
446  public bool enableAutoSizing
447  {
448  get { return m_enableAutoSizing; }
449  set { if (m_enableAutoSizing == value) return; m_enableAutoSizing = value; SetVerticesDirty(); SetLayoutDirty(); }
450  }
451  [SerializeField]
452  protected bool m_enableAutoSizing;
453  protected float m_maxFontSize; // Used in conjunction with auto-sizing
454  protected float m_minFontSize; // Used in conjunction with auto-sizing

647  get { return m_overflowMode; }

653 
657  public bool isTextOverflowing
658  {
659  get { if (m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex != -1) return true; return false; }
660  }
661 
662 
666  public int firstOverflowCharacterIndex
667  {
668  get { return m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex; }
669  }

672 
673 
677  public TMP_Text linkedTextComponent
678  {
679  get { return m_linkedTextComponent; }
680 
681  set
682  {
683  if (m_linkedTextComponent != value)
684  {
685  // Release previously linked text component.
686  if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
687  {
688  m_linkedTextComponent.overflowMode = TextOverflowModes.Overflow;
689  m_linkedTextComponent.linkedTextComponent = null;
690  m_linkedTextComponent.isLinkedTextComponent = false;
691  }
692 
693  m_linkedTextComponent = value;
694 
695  if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
696  m_linkedTextComponent.isLinkedTextComponent = true;
697  }
698 
699  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
700  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
701  SetVerticesDirty();
702  SetLayoutDirty();
703  }
704  }
705  [SerializeField]
706  protected TMP_Text m_linkedTextComponent;
707 
708 
712  public bool isLinkedTextComponent
713  {
714  get { return m_isLinkedTextComponent; }
715 
716  set
717  {
718  m_isLinkedTextComponent = value;
719 
720  if (m_isLinkedTextComponent == false)
721  m_firstVisibleCharacter = 0;
722 
723  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
724  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
725  SetVerticesDirty();
726  SetLayoutDirty();
727  }
728  }
729  [SerializeField]
730  protected bool m_isLinkedTextComponent;
731 
732 
736  public bool isTextTruncated { get { return m_isTextTruncated; } }
737  [SerializeField]
738  protected bool m_isTextTruncated;
739 
740

748  }
749  [SerializeField]
750  protected bool m_enableKerning;
751 
752 
756  public bool extraPadding
757  {
758  get { return m_enableExtraPadding; }
759  set { if (m_enableExtraPadding == value) return; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; m_enableExtraPadding = value; UpdateMeshPadding(); /* m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;*/ SetVerticesDirty(); /* SetLayoutDirty();*/ }
760  }
761  [SerializeField]
762  protected bool m_enableExtraPadding = false;
763  [SerializeField]
764  protected bool checkPaddingRequired;
765

774  }

1479  protected virtual Material CreateMaterialInstance(Material source)
1480  {
1481  Material mat = new Material(source);
1482  mat.shaderKeywords = source.shaderKeywords;
1483  mat.name += " (Instance)";
1484 
1485  return mat;
1486  }

1488  protected void SetVertexColorGradient(TMP_ColorGradient gradient)
1489  {
1490  if (gradient == null) return;
1491 
1492  m_fontColorGradient.bottomLeft = gradient.bottomLeft;
1493  m_fontColorGradient.bottomRight = gradient.bottomRight;
1494  m_fontColorGradient.topLeft = gradient.topLeft;
1495  m_fontColorGradient.topRight = gradient.topRight;
1496 
1497  SetVerticesDirty();
1498  }

1591  internal void SetTextInternal(string text)
1592  {
1593  m_text = text;
1594  m_renderMode = TextRenderFlags.DontRender;
1595  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1596  ForceMeshUpdate();
1597  m_renderMode = TextRenderFlags.Render;
1598  }

1653  public override void CrossFadeColor(Color targetColor, float duration, bool ignoreTimeScale, bool useAlpha)
1654  {
1655  base.CrossFadeColor(targetColor, duration, ignoreTimeScale, useAlpha);
1656  InternalCrossFadeColor(targetColor, duration, ignoreTimeScale, useAlpha);
1657  }
1658 
1659

1667  {
1668  base.CrossFadeAlpha(alpha, duration, ignoreTimeScale);
1669  InternalCrossFadeAlpha(alpha, duration, ignoreTimeScale);
1670  }

1672 
1681  protected virtual void InternalCrossFadeColor(Color targetColor, float duration, bool ignoreTimeScale, bool useAlpha) { }
1682 
1683 
1690  protected virtual void InternalCrossFadeAlpha(float alpha, float duration, bool ignoreTimeScale) { }
1691 
1692 
1696  protected void ParseInputText()
1697  {
1698  //Debug.Log("Re-parsing Text.");
1700 
1701  m_isInputParsingRequired = false;
1702 
1703  switch (m_inputSource)
1704  {
1705  case TextInputSources.String:
1706  case TextInputSources.Text:
1707  StringToCharArray(m_text, ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1708  break;
1709  case TextInputSources.SetText:
1710  SetTextArrayToCharArray(m_input_CharArray, ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1711  break;
1712  case TextInputSources.SetCharArray:
1713  break;
1714  }
1715 
1716  SetArraySizes(m_TextParsingBuffer);
1718  }
1719 
1720 
1725  public void SetText(string text)
1726  {
1727  SetText(text, true);
1728  }
1729 
1730 
1735  public void SetText(string text, bool syncTextInputBox)
1736  {
1737  //if (text == old_text) return;
1738 
1739  //old_text = text;
1740 
1741  m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
1742 
1743  StringToCharArray(text, ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1744 
1745  #if UNITY_EDITOR
1746  // Set the text in the Text Input Box in the Unity Editor only.
1747  // TODO: Could revise to convert to string literal
1748  if (syncTextInputBox)
1749  m_text = text;
1750  #endif
1751 
1752  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1753  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
1754  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
1755 
1756  SetVerticesDirty();
1757  SetLayoutDirty();
1758  }
1759 
1760 
1768  public void SetText(string text, float arg0)
1769  {
1770  SetText(text, arg0, 255, 255);
1771  }
1772 
1781  public void SetText(string text, float arg0, float arg1)
1782  {
1783  SetText(text, arg0, arg1, 255);
1784  }
1785 
1795  public void SetText(string text, float arg0, float arg1, float arg2)
1796  {
1797  int decimalPrecision = 0;
1798  int index = 0;
1799 
1800  for (int i = 0; i < text.Length; i++)
1801  {
1802  char c = text[i];
1803 
1804  if (c == 123) // '{'
1805  {
1806  // Check if user is requesting some decimal precision. Format is {0:2}
1807  if (text[i + 2] == 58) // ':'
1808  {
1809  decimalPrecision = text[i + 3] - 48;
1810  }
1811 
1812  switch (text[i + 1] - 48)
1813  {
1814  case 0: // 1st Arg
1815  AddFloatToCharArray(arg0, ref index, decimalPrecision);
1816  break;
1817  case 1: // 2nd Arg
1818  AddFloatToCharArray(arg1, ref index, decimalPrecision);
1819  break;
1820  case 2: // 3rd Arg
1821  AddFloatToCharArray(arg2, ref index, decimalPrecision);
1822  break;
1823  }
1824 
1825  if (text[i + 2] == 58)
1826  i += 4;
1827  else
1828  i += 2;
1829 
1830  continue;
1831  }
1832  m_input_CharArray[index] = c;
1833  index += 1;
1834  }
1835 
1836  m_input_CharArray[index] = (char)0;
1837  m_charArray_Length = index; // Set the length to where this '0' termination is.
1838 
1839  #if UNITY_EDITOR
1840  // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
1841  m_text = new string(m_input_CharArray, 0, index);
1842  #endif
1843 
1844  m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetText;
1845  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1846  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
1847  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
1848 
1849  SetVerticesDirty();
1850  SetLayoutDirty();
1851  }
1852 
1853 
1861  public void SetText(StringBuilder text)
1862  {
1863  m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
1864 
1865  #if UNITY_EDITOR
1866  // Set the text in the Text Input Box in the Unity Editor only.
1867  m_text = text.ToString();
1868  #endif
1869 
1870  StringBuilderToIntArray(text, ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1871 
1872  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1873  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
1874  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
1875 
1876  SetVerticesDirty();
1877  SetLayoutDirty();
1878  }
1879 
1880 
1885  public void SetCharArray(char[] sourceText)
1886  {
1887  // Initialize internal character buffer if necessary
1888  if (m_TextParsingBuffer == null) m_TextParsingBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
1889 
1890  #if UNITY_EDITOR
1891  // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
1892  if (sourceText == null || sourceText.Length == 0)
1893  m_text = string.Empty;
1894  else
1895  m_text = new string(sourceText);
1896  #endif
1897 
1898  // Clear the Style stack.
1899  m_styleStack.Clear();
1900 
1901  int writeIndex = 0;
1902 
1903  for (int i = 0; sourceText != null && i < sourceText.Length; i++)
1904  {
1905  if (sourceText[i] == 92 && i < sourceText.Length - 1)
1906  {
1907  switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
1908  {
1909  case 110: // \n LineFeed
1910  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1911 
1912  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
1913  i += 1;
1914  writeIndex += 1;
1915  continue;
1916  case 114: // \r LineFeed
1917  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1918 
1919  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
1920  i += 1;
1921  writeIndex += 1;
1922  continue;
1923  case 116: // \t Tab
1924  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1925 
1926  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
1927  i += 1;
1928  writeIndex += 1;
1929  continue;
1930  }
1931  }
1932 
1933  // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
1934  if (sourceText[i] == 60)
1935  {
1936  if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
1937  {
1938  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1939 
1940  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10; ;
1941  writeIndex += 1;
1942  i += 3;
1943 
1944  continue;
1945  }
1946  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
1947  {
1948  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out int srcOffset, ref m_TextParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex))
1949  {
1950  i = srcOffset;
1951  continue;
1952  }
1953  }
1954  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
1955  {
1956  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref m_TextParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
1957 
1958  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
1959  i += 7;
1960  continue;
1961  }
1962  }
1963 
1964  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1965 
1966  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
1967  writeIndex += 1;
1968  }
1969 
1970  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
1971 
1972  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
1973 
1974  m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
1975  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1976  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
1977  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
1978 
1979  SetVerticesDirty();
1980  SetLayoutDirty();
1981  }
1982 
1983 
1988  public void SetCharArray(char[] sourceText, int start, int length)
1989  {
1990  // Initialize internal character buffer if necessary
1991  if (m_TextParsingBuffer == null) m_TextParsingBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
1992 
1993  #if UNITY_EDITOR
1994  // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
1995  if (sourceText == null || sourceText.Length == 0 || length == 0)
1996  {
1997  m_text = string.Empty;
1998  start = 0;
1999  length = 0;
2000  }
2001  else
2002  {
2003  // TODO: Add potential range check on start + length relative to array size.
2004  m_text = new string(sourceText, start, length);
2005  }
2006  #endif
2007 
2008  // Clear the Style stack.
2009  m_styleStack.Clear();
2010 
2011  int writeIndex = 0;
2012 
2013  int i = start;
2014  int end = start + length;
2015  for (; i < end; i++)
2016  {
2017  if (sourceText[i] == 92 && i < length - 1)
2018  {
2019  switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2020  {
2021  case 110: // \n LineFeed
2022  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2023 
2024  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2025  i += 1;
2026  writeIndex += 1;
2027  continue;
2028  case 114: // \r LineFeed
2029  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2030 
2031  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2032  i += 1;
2033  writeIndex += 1;
2034  continue;
2035  case 116: // \t Tab
2036  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2037 
2038  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2039  i += 1;
2040  writeIndex += 1;
2041  continue;
2042  }
2043  }
2044 
2045  // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2046  if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2047  {
2048  if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2049  {
2050  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2051 
2052  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2053  writeIndex += 1;
2054  i += 3;
2055 
2056  continue;
2057  }
2058  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2059  {
2060  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out int srcOffset, ref m_TextParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2061  {
2062  i = srcOffset;
2063  continue;
2064  }
2065  }
2066  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2067  {
2068  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref m_TextParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2069 
2070  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2071  i += 7;
2072  continue;
2073  }
2074  }
2075 
2076  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2077 
2078  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2079  writeIndex += 1;
2080  }
2081 
2082  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2083 
2084  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2085 
2086  m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
2087  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
2088  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
2089  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
2090 
2091  SetVerticesDirty();
2092  SetLayoutDirty();
2093  }
2094 
2095 
2100  public void SetCharArray(int[] sourceText, int start, int length)
2101  {
2102  // Initialize internal character buffer if necessary
2103  if (m_TextParsingBuffer == null) m_TextParsingBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
2104 
2105  #if UNITY_EDITOR
2106  // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2107  if (sourceText == null || sourceText.Length == 0 || length == 0)
2108  {
2109  m_text = string.Empty;
2110  start = 0;
2111  length = 0;
2112  }
2113  else
2114  {
2115  m_text = sourceText.IntToString(start, length);
2116  }
2117  #endif
2118 
2119  // Clear the Style stack.
2120  m_styleStack.Clear();
2121 
2122  int writeIndex = 0;
2123 
2124  int end = start + length;
2125  for (int i = start; i < end && i < sourceText.Length; i++)
2126  {
2127  if (sourceText[i] == 92 && i < length - 1)
2128  {
2129  switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2130  {
2131  case 110: // \n LineFeed
2132  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2133 
2134  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2135  i += 1;
2136  writeIndex += 1;
2137  continue;
2138  case 114: // \r LineFeed
2139  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2140 
2141  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2142  i += 1;
2143  writeIndex += 1;
2144  continue;
2145  case 116: // \t Tab
2146  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2147 
2148  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2149  i += 1;
2150  writeIndex += 1;
2151  continue;
2152  }
2153  }
2154 
2155  // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2156  if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2157  {
2158  if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2159  {
2160  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2161 
2162  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2163  writeIndex += 1;
2164  i += 3;
2165 
2166  continue;
2167  }
2168  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2169  {
2170  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out int srcOffset, ref m_TextParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2171  {
2172  i = srcOffset;
2173  continue;
2174  }
2175  }
2176  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2177  {
2178  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref m_TextParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2179 
2180  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2181  i += 7;
2182  continue;
2183  }
2184  }
2185 
2186  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2187 
2188  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2189  writeIndex += 1;
2190  }
2191 
2192  if (writeIndex == m_TextParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
2193 
2194  m_TextParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2195 
2196  m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
2197  m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
2198  m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
2199  m_isCalculateSizeRequired = true;
2200 
2201  SetVerticesDirty();
2202  SetLayoutDirty();
2203  }
2204 
2205 
2211  protected void SetTextArrayToCharArray(char[] sourceText, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer)
2212  {
2213  //Debug.Log("SetText Array to Char called.");
2214  if (sourceText == null || m_charArray_Length == 0)
2215  return;
2216 
2217  if (charBuffer == null) charBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
2218 
2219  // Clear the Style stack.
2220  m_styleStack.Clear();
2221 
2222  int writeIndex = 0;
2223 
2224  for (int i = 0; i < m_charArray_Length; i++)
2225  {
2226  // Handle UTF-32 in the input text (string).
2227  if (char.IsHighSurrogate(sourceText[i]) && char.IsLowSurrogate(sourceText[i + 1]))
2228  {
2229  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2230 
2231  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = char.ConvertToUtf32(sourceText[i], sourceText[i + 1]);
2232  i += 1;
2233  writeIndex += 1;
2234  continue;
2235  }
2236 
2237  // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2238  if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2239  {
2240  if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2241  {
2242  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2243 
2244  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2245  writeIndex += 1;
2246  i += 3;
2247 
2248  continue;
2249  }
2250  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2251  {
2252  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out int srcOffset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2253  {
2254  i = srcOffset;
2255  continue;
2256  }
2257  }
2258  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2259  {
2260  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2261 
2262  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2263  i += 7;
2264  continue;
2265  }
2266  }
2267 
2268  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2269 
2270  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2271  writeIndex += 1;
2272  }
2273 
2274  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2275 
2276  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2277  }
2278 
2279 
2285  protected void StringToCharArray(string sourceText, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer)
2286  {
2287  if (sourceText == null)
2288  {
2289  charBuffer[0].unicode = 0;
2290  return;
2291  }
2292 
2293  if (charBuffer == null) charBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
2294 
2295  // Clear the Style stack.
2296  m_styleStack.SetDefault(0);
2297 
2298  int writeIndex = 0;
2299 
2300  for (int i = 0; i < sourceText.Length; i++)
2301  {
2302  if (m_inputSource == TextInputSources.Text && sourceText[i] == 92 && sourceText.Length > i + 1)
2303  {
2304  switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2305  {
2306  case 85: // \U00000000 for UTF-32 Unicode
2307  if (sourceText.Length > i + 9)
2308  {
2309  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2310 
2311  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF32(sourceText, i + 2);
2312  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2313  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 10;
2314 
2315  i += 9;
2316  writeIndex += 1;
2317  continue;
2318  }
2319  break;
2320  case 92: // \ escape
2321  if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2322 
2323  if (sourceText.Length <= i + 2) break;
2324 
2325  if (writeIndex + 2 > charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2326 
2327  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i + 1];
2328  charBuffer[writeIndex + 1].unicode = sourceText[i + 2];
2329  i += 2;
2330  writeIndex += 2;
2331  continue;
2332  case 110: // \n LineFeed
2333  if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2334 
2335  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2336 
2337  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2338  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2339  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 1;
2340 
2341  i += 1;
2342  writeIndex += 1;
2343  continue;
2344  case 114: // \r
2345  if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2346 
2347  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2348 
2349  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2350  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2351  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 1;
2352 
2353  i += 1;
2354  writeIndex += 1;
2355  continue;
2356  case 116: // \t Tab
2357  if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2358 
2359  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2360 
2361  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2362  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2363  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 1;
2364 
2365  i += 1;
2366  writeIndex += 1;
2367  continue;
2368  case 117: // \u0000 for UTF-16 Unicode
2369  if (sourceText.Length > i + 5)
2370  {
2371  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2372 
2373  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF16(sourceText, i + 2);
2374  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2375  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 6;
2376 
2377  i += 5;
2378  writeIndex += 1;
2379  continue;
2380  }
2381  break;
2382  }
2383  }
2384 
2385  // Handle UTF-32 in the input text (string). // Not sure this is needed //
2386  if (char.IsHighSurrogate(sourceText[i]) && char.IsLowSurrogate(sourceText[i + 1]))
2387  {
2388  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2389 
2390  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = char.ConvertToUtf32(sourceText[i], sourceText[i + 1]);
2391  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2392  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 2;
2393 
2394  i += 1;
2395  writeIndex += 1;
2396  continue;
2397  }
2398 
2400  if (sourceText[i] == 60 && m_isRichText)
2401  {
2402  if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2403  {
2404  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2405 
2406  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2407  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2408  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 1;
2409 
2410  writeIndex += 1;
2411  i += 3;
2412 
2413  continue;
2414  }
2415  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2416  {
2417  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out int srcOffset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2418  {
2419  i = srcOffset;
2420  continue;
2421  }
2422  }
2423  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2424  {
2425  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2426 
2427  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2428  i += 7;
2429  continue;
2430  }
2431  }
2432 
2433  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2434 
2435  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2436  charBuffer[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2437  charBuffer[writeIndex].length = 1;
2438 
2439  writeIndex += 1;
2440  }
2441 
2442  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2443 
2444  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2445  }
2446 
2447 
2453  protected void StringBuilderToIntArray(StringBuilder sourceText, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer)
2454  {
2455  if (sourceText == null)
2456  {
2457  charBuffer[0].unicode = 0;
2458  return;
2459  }
2460 
2461  if (charBuffer == null) charBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
2462 
2463  // Clear the Style stack.
2464  m_styleStack.Clear();
2465 
2466  #if UNITY_EDITOR
2467  // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2468  m_text = sourceText.ToString();
2469  #endif
2470 
2471  int writeIndex = 0;
2472 
2473  for (int i = 0; i < sourceText.Length; i++)
2474  {
2475  if (m_parseCtrlCharacters && sourceText[i] == 92 && sourceText.Length > i + 1)
2476  {
2477  switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2478  {
2479  case 85: // \U00000000 for UTF-32 Unicode
2480  if (sourceText.Length > i + 9)
2481  {
2482  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2483 
2484  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF32(sourceText, i + 2);
2485  i += 9;
2486  writeIndex += 1;
2487  continue;
2488  }
2489  break;
2490  case 92: // \ escape
2491  if (sourceText.Length <= i + 2) break;
2492 
2493  if (writeIndex + 2 > charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2494 
2495  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i + 1];
2496  charBuffer[writeIndex + 1].unicode = sourceText[i + 2];
2497  i += 2;
2498  writeIndex += 2;
2499  continue;
2500  case 110: // \n LineFeed
2501  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2502 
2503  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2504  i += 1;
2505  writeIndex += 1;
2506  continue;
2507  case 114: // \r
2508  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2509 
2510  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2511  i += 1;
2512  writeIndex += 1;
2513  continue;
2514  case 116: // \t Tab
2515  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2516 
2517  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2518  i += 1;
2519  writeIndex += 1;
2520  continue;
2521  case 117: // \u0000 for UTF-16 Unicode
2522  if (sourceText.Length > i + 5)
2523  {
2524  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2525 
2526  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF16(sourceText, i + 2);
2527  i += 5;
2528  writeIndex += 1;
2529  continue;
2530  }
2531  break;
2532  }
2533  }
2534 
2535  // Handle UTF-32 in the input text (string).
2536  if (char.IsHighSurrogate(sourceText[i]) && char.IsLowSurrogate(sourceText[i + 1]))
2537  {
2538  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2539 
2540  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = char.ConvertToUtf32(sourceText[i], sourceText[i + 1]);
2541  i += 1;
2542  writeIndex += 1;
2543  continue;
2544  }
2545 
2546  // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2547  if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2548  {
2549  if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2550  {
2551  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2552 
2553  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2554  writeIndex += 1;
2555  i += 3;
2556 
2557  continue;
2558  }
2559  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2560  {
2561  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out int srcOffset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2562  {
2563  i = srcOffset;
2564  continue;
2565  }
2566  }
2567  else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2568  {
2569  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2570 
2571  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2572  i += 7;
2573  continue;
2574  }
2575  }
2576 
2577  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2578 
2579  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2580  writeIndex += 1;
2581  }
2582 
2583  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2584 
2585  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2586  }
2587 
2588 
2598  bool ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref string sourceText, int srcIndex, out int srcOffset, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
2599  {
2600  // Validate <style> tag.
2601  int hashCode = GetTagHashCode(ref sourceText, srcIndex + 7, out srcOffset);
2602 
2603  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
2604 
2605  // Return if we don't have a valid style.
2606  if (style == null || srcOffset == 0) return false;
2607 
2608  m_styleStack.Add(style.hashCode);
2609 
2610  int styleLength = style.styleOpeningTagArray.Length;
2611 
2612  // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
2613  int[] openingTagArray = style.styleOpeningTagArray;
2614 
2615  for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
2616  {
2617  int c = openingTagArray[i];
2618 
2619  if (c == 60)
2620  {
2621  if (IsTagName(ref openingTagArray, "<BR>", i))
2622  {
2623  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2624 
2625  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2626  writeIndex += 1;
2627  i += 3;
2628 
2629  continue;
2630  }
2631  else if (IsTagName(ref openingTagArray, "<STYLE=", i))
2632  {
2633  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref openingTagArray, i, out int offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2634  {
2635  i = offset;
2636  continue;
2637  }
2638  }
2639  else if (IsTagName(ref openingTagArray, "</STYLE>", i))
2640  {
2641  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref openingTagArray, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2642 
2643  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2644  i += 7;
2645  continue;
2646  }
2647  }
2648 
2649  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2650 
2651  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
2652  writeIndex += 1;
2653  }
2654 
2655  return true;
2656  }
2657 
2658 
2668  bool ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref int[] sourceText, int srcIndex, out int srcOffset, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
2669  {
2670  // Validate <style> tag.
2671  int hashCode = GetTagHashCode(ref sourceText, srcIndex + 7, out srcOffset);
2672 
2673  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
2674 
2675  // Return if we don't have a valid style.
2676  if (style == null || srcOffset == 0) return false;
2677 
2678  m_styleStack.Add(style.hashCode);
2679 
2680  int styleLength = style.styleOpeningTagArray.Length;
2681 
2682  // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
2683  int[] openingTagArray = style.styleOpeningTagArray;
2684 
2685  for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
2686  {
2687  int c = openingTagArray[i];
2688 
2689  if (c == 60)
2690  {
2691  if (IsTagName(ref openingTagArray, "<BR>", i))
2692  {
2693  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2694 
2695  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2696  writeIndex += 1;
2697  i += 3;
2698 
2699  continue;
2700  }
2701  else if (IsTagName(ref openingTagArray, "<STYLE=", i))
2702  {
2703  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref openingTagArray, i, out int offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2704  {
2705  i = offset;
2706  continue;
2707  }
2708  }
2709  else if (IsTagName(ref openingTagArray, "</STYLE>", i))
2710  {
2711  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref openingTagArray, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2712 
2713  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2714  i += 7;
2715  continue;
2716  }
2717  }
2718 
2719  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2720 
2721  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
2722  writeIndex += 1;
2723  }
2724 
2725  return true;
2726  }
2727 
2728 
2738  bool ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref char[] sourceText, int srcIndex, out int srcOffset, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
2739  {
2740  // Validate <style> tag.
2741  int hashCode = GetTagHashCode(ref sourceText, srcIndex + 7, out srcOffset);
2742 
2743  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
2744

2749

2754

2756  {

2758

2765  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;

2767  i += 3;

2769  continue;

2780  {

2782

2784  i += 7;
2785  continue;
2786  }
2787  }
2788

2790 
2791  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
2792  writeIndex += 1;
2793  }
2794 
2795  return true;
2796  }
2797

2863  }
2864 
2865  return true;
2866  }
2867 
2868 
2877  bool ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref string sourceText, int srcIndex, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
2878  {
2879  // Get style from the Style Stack
2880  int hashCode = m_styleStack.CurrentItem();
2881  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
2882 
2883  m_styleStack.Remove();
2884 
2885  // Return if we don't have a valid style.
2886  if (style == null) return false;
2887 
2888  int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
2889 
2890  // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
2891  int[] closingTagArray = style.styleClosingTagArray;
2892 
2893  for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
2894  {
2895  int c = closingTagArray[i];
2896 
2897  if (c == 60)
2898  {
2899  if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<BR>", i))
2900  {
2901  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2902 
2903  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2904  writeIndex += 1;
2905  i += 3;
2906 
2907  continue;
2908  }
2909  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<STYLE=", i))
2910  {
2911  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, out int offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2912  {
2913  i = offset;
2914  continue;
2915  }
2916  }
2917  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "</STYLE>", i))
2918  {
2919  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2920 
2921  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2922  i += 7;
2923  continue;
2924  }
2925  }
2926 
2927  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2928 
2929  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
2930  writeIndex += 1;
2931  }
2932 
2933  return true;
2934  }
2935 
2936 
2945  bool ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref int[] sourceText, int srcIndex, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
2946  {
2947  // Get style from the Style Stack
2948  int hashCode = m_styleStack.CurrentItem();
2949  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
2950 
2951  m_styleStack.Remove();
2952 
2953  // Return if we don't have a valid style.
2954  if (style == null) return false;
2955 
2956  int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
2957 
2958  // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
2959  int[] closingTagArray = style.styleClosingTagArray;
2960 
2961  for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
2962  {
2963  int c = closingTagArray[i];
2964 
2965  if (c == 60)
2966  {
2967  if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<BR>", i))
2968  {
2969  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2970 
2971  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2972  writeIndex += 1;
2973  i += 3;
2974 
2975  continue;
2976  }
2977  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<STYLE=", i))
2978  {
2979  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, out int offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2980  {
2981  i = offset;
2982  continue;
2983  }
2984  }
2985  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "</STYLE>", i))
2986  {
2987  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2988 
2989  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2990  i += 7;
2991  continue;
2992  }
2993  }
2994 
2995  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
2996 
2997  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
2998  writeIndex += 1;
2999  }
3000 
3001  return true;
3002  }
3003 
3004 
3013  bool ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref char[] sourceText, int srcIndex, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
3014  {
3015  // Get style from the Style Stack
3016  int hashCode = m_styleStack.CurrentItem();
3017  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
3018 
3019  m_styleStack.Remove();
3020 
3021  // Return if we don't have a valid style.
3022  if (style == null) return false;
3023 
3024  int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
3025 
3026  // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
3027  int[] closingTagArray = style.styleClosingTagArray;
3028 
3029  for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
3030  {
3031  int c = closingTagArray[i];
3032 
3033  if (c == 60)
3034  {
3035  if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<BR>", i))
3036  {
3037  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3038 
3039  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
3040  writeIndex += 1;
3041  i += 3;
3042 
3043  continue;
3044  }
3045  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<STYLE=", i))
3046  {
3047  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, out int offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
3048  {
3049  i = offset;
3050  continue;
3051  }
3052  }
3053  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "</STYLE>", i))
3054  {
3055  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
3056 
3057  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
3058  i += 7;
3059  continue;
3060  }
3061  }
3062 
3063  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3064 
3065  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
3066  writeIndex += 1;
3067  }
3068 
3069  return true;
3070  }
3071 
3080  bool ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref StringBuilder sourceText, int srcIndex, ref UnicodeChar[] charBuffer, ref int writeIndex)
3081  {
3082  // Get style from the Style Stack
3083  int hashCode = m_styleStack.CurrentItem();
3084  TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(hashCode);
3085 
3086  m_styleStack.Remove();
3087 
3088  // Return if we don't have a valid style.
3089  if (style == null) return false;
3090 
3091  int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
3092 
3093  // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
3094  int[] closingTagArray = style.styleClosingTagArray;
3095 
3096  for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
3097  {
3098  int c = closingTagArray[i];
3099 
3100  if (c == 60)
3101  {
3102  if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<BR>", i))
3103  {
3104  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3105 
3106  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
3107  writeIndex += 1;
3108  i += 3;
3109 
3110  continue;
3111  }
3112  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "<STYLE=", i))
3113  {
3114  if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, out int offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
3115  {
3116  i = offset;
3117  continue;
3118  }
3119  }
3120  else if (IsTagName(ref closingTagArray, "</STYLE>", i))
3121  {
3122  ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref closingTagArray, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
3123 
3124  // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
3125  i += 7;
3126  continue;
3127  }
3128  }
3129 
3130  if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3131 
3132  charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
3133  writeIndex += 1;
3134  }
3135 
3136  return true;
3137  }
3138 
3139 
3147  bool IsTagName (ref string text, string tag, int index)
3148  {
3149  if (text.Length < index + tag.Length) return false;
3150 
3151  for (int i = 0; i < tag.Length; i++)
3152  {
3153  if (TMP_TextUtilities.ToUpperFast(text[index + i]) != tag[i]) return false;
3154  }
3155 
3156  return true;
3157  }
3158 
3166  bool IsTagName(ref char[] text, string tag, int index)
3167  {
3168  if (text.Length < index + tag.Length) return false;
3169 
3170  for (int i = 0; i < tag.Length; i++)
3171  {
3172  if (TMP_TextUtilities.ToUpperFast(text[index + i]) != tag[i]) return false;
3173  }
3174 
3175  return true;
3176  }
3177 
3185  bool IsTagName(ref int[] text, string tag, int index)
3186  {
3187  if (text.Length < index + tag.Length) return false;
3188 
3189  for (int i = 0; i < tag.Length; i++)
3190  {
3191  if (TMP_TextUtilities.ToUpperFast((char)text[index + i]) != tag[i]) return false;
3192  }
3193 
3194  return true;
3195  }
3196 
3204  bool IsTagName(ref StringBuilder text, string tag, int index)
3205  {
3206  if (text.Length < index + tag.Length) return false;
3207 
3208  for (int i = 0; i < tag.Length; i++)
3209  {
3210  if (TMP_TextUtilities.ToUpperFast(text[index + i]) != tag[i]) return false;
3211  }
3212 
3213  return true;
3214  }
3215 
3223  int GetTagHashCode(ref string text, int index, out int closeIndex)
3224  {
3225  int hashCode = 0;
3226  closeIndex = 0;
3227 
3228  for (int i = index; i < text.Length; i++)
3229  {
3230  // Skip quote '"' character
3231  if (text[i] == 34) continue;
3232 
3233  // Break at '>'
3234  if (text[i] == 62) { closeIndex = i; break; }
3235 
3236  hashCode = (hashCode << 5) + hashCode ^ text[i];
3237  }
3238 
3239  return hashCode;
3240  }
3241 
3249  int GetTagHashCode(ref char[] text, int index, out int closeIndex)
3250  {
3251  int hashCode = 0;
3252  closeIndex = 0;
3253 
3254  for (int i = index; i < text.Length; i++)
3255  {
3256  // Skip quote '"' character
3257  if (text[i] == 34) continue;
3258 
3259  // Break at '>'
3260  if (text[i] == 62) { closeIndex = i; break; }
3261 
3262  hashCode = (hashCode << 5) + hashCode ^ text[i];
3263  }
3264 
3265  return hashCode;
3266  }
3267 
3275  int GetTagHashCode(ref int[] text, int index, out int closeIndex)
3276  {
3277  int hashCode = 0;
3278  closeIndex = 0;
3279 
3280  for (int i = index; i < text.Length; i++)
3281  {
3282  // Skip quote '"' character
3283  if (text[i] == 34) continue;
3284 
3285  // Break at '>'
3286  if (text[i] == 62) { closeIndex = i; break; }
3287 
3288  hashCode = (hashCode << 5) + hashCode ^ text[i];
3289  }
3290 
3291  return hashCode;
3292  }
3293 
3301  int GetTagHashCode(ref StringBuilder text, int index, out int closeIndex)
3302  {
3303  int hashCode = 0;
3304  closeIndex = 0;
3305 
3306  for (int i = index; i < text.Length; i++)
3307  {
3308  // Skip quote '"' character
3309  if (text[i] == 34) continue;
3310 
3311  // Break at '>'
3312  if (text[i] == 62) { closeIndex = i; break; }
3313 
3314  hashCode = (hashCode << 5) + hashCode ^ text[i];
3315  }
3316 
3317  return hashCode;
3318  }
3319 
3323  void ResizeInternalArray <T>(ref T[] array)
3324  {
3325  int size = Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(array.Length + 1);
3326 
3327  System.Array.Resize(ref array, size);
3328  }
3329 
3330 
3331  private readonly float[] k_Power = { 5e-1f, 5e-2f, 5e-3f, 5e-4f, 5e-5f, 5e-6f, 5e-7f, 5e-8f, 5e-9f, 5e-10f }; // Used by FormatText to enable rounding and avoid using Mathf.Pow.
3332 
3339  protected void AddFloatToCharArray(double number, ref int index, int precision)
3340  {
3341  if (number < 0)
3342  {
3343  m_input_CharArray[index++] = '-';
3344  number = -number;
3345  }
3346 
3347  number += k_Power[Mathf.Min(9, precision)];
3348 
3349  double integer = Math.Truncate(number);
3350 
3351  AddIntToCharArray(integer, ref index, precision);
3352 
3353  if (precision > 0)
3354  {
3355  // Add the decimal point
3356  m_input_CharArray[index++] = '.';
3357 
3358  number -= integer;
3359  for (int p = 0; p < precision; p++)
3360  {
3361  number *= 10;
3362  long d = (long)(number);
3363 
3364  m_input_CharArray[index++] = (char)(d + 48);
3365  number -= d;
3366  }
3367  }
3368  }
3369 
3370 
3377  protected void AddIntToCharArray(double number, ref int index, int precision)
3378  {
3379  if (number < 0)
3380  {
3381  m_input_CharArray[index++] = '-';
3382  number = -number;
3383  }
3384 
3385  int i = index;
3386  do
3387  {
3388  m_input_CharArray[i++] = (char)(number % 10 + 48);
3389  number /= 10;
3390  } while (number > 0.999d);
3391 
3392  int lastIndex = i;
3393 
3394  // Reverse string
3395  while (index + 1 < i)
3396  {
3397  i -= 1;
3398  char t = m_input_CharArray[index];
3399  m_input_CharArray[index] = m_input_CharArray[i];
3400  m_input_CharArray[i] = t;
3401  index += 1;
3402  }
3403  index = lastIndex;
3404  }
3405 
3406 
3412  protected virtual int SetArraySizes(UnicodeChar[] chars) { return 0; }
3413 
3414 
3418  protected virtual void GenerateTextMesh() { }
3419 
3420 
3425  public Vector2 GetPreferredValues()
3426  {
3427  if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
3428  {
3429  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3430  ParseInputText();
3431  }
3432 
3433  // CALCULATE PREFERRED WIDTH
3434  float preferredWidth = GetPreferredWidth();
3435 
3436  // CALCULATE PREFERRED HEIGHT
3437  float preferredHeight = GetPreferredHeight();
3438 
3439  return new Vector2(preferredWidth, preferredHeight);
3440  }
3441 
3442 
3447  public Vector2 GetPreferredValues(float width, float height)
3448  {
3449  if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
3450  {
3451  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3452  ParseInputText();
3453  }
3454 
3455  Vector2 margin = new Vector2(width, height);
3456 
3457  // CALCULATE PREFERRED WIDTH
3458  float preferredWidth = GetPreferredWidth(margin);
3459 
3460  // CALCULATE PREFERRED HEIGHT
3461  float preferredHeight = GetPreferredHeight(margin);
3462 
3463  return new Vector2(preferredWidth, preferredHeight);
3464  }
3465 
3466 
3472  public Vector2 GetPreferredValues(string text)
3473  {
3474  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3475 
3476  StringToCharArray(text, ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
3477  SetArraySizes(m_TextParsingBuffer);
3478 
3479  Vector2 margin = k_LargePositiveVector2;
3480 
3481  // CALCULATE PREFERRED WIDTH
3482  float preferredWidth = GetPreferredWidth(margin);
3483 
3484  // CALCULATE PREFERRED HEIGHT
3485  float preferredHeight = GetPreferredHeight(margin);
3486 
3487  return new Vector2(preferredWidth, preferredHeight);
3488  }
3489 
3490 
3496  public Vector2 GetPreferredValues(string text, float width, float height)
3497  {
3498  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3499 
3500  StringToCharArray(text, ref m_TextParsingBuffer);
3501  SetArraySizes(m_TextParsingBuffer);
3502 
3503  Vector2 margin = new Vector2(width, height);
3504 
3505  // CALCULATE PREFERRED WIDTH
3506  float preferredWidth = GetPreferredWidth(margin);
3507 
3508  // CALCULATE PREFERRED HEIGHT
3509  float preferredHeight = GetPreferredHeight(margin);
3510 
3511  return new Vector2(preferredWidth, preferredHeight);
3512  }
3513 
3514 
3519  protected float GetPreferredWidth()
3520  {
3521  if (TMP_Settings.instance == null) return 0;
3522 
3523  float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
3524 
3525  // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
3526  m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
3527  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
3528  m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
3529 
3530  // Set Margins to Infinity
3531  Vector2 margin = k_LargePositiveVector2;
3532 
3533  if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
3534  {
3535  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3536  ParseInputText();
3537  }
3538 
3539  m_recursiveCount = 0;
3540  float preferredWidth = CalculatePreferredValues(fontSize, margin, true).x;
3541 
3542  m_isPreferredWidthDirty = false;
3543 
3544  //Debug.Log("GetPreferredWidth() Called at frame " + Time.frameCount + ". Returning width of " + preferredWidth);
3545 
3546  return preferredWidth;
3547  }
3548 
3549 
3555  protected float GetPreferredWidth(Vector2 margin)
3556  {
3557  float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
3558 
3559  // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
3560  m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
3561  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
3562  m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
3563 
3564  m_recursiveCount = 0;
3565  float preferredWidth = CalculatePreferredValues(fontSize, margin, true).x;
3566 
3567  //Debug.Log("GetPreferredWidth() Called. Returning width of " + preferredWidth);
3568 
3569  return preferredWidth;
3570  }
3571 
3572 
3577  protected float GetPreferredHeight()
3578  {
3579  if (TMP_Settings.instance == null) return 0;
3580 
3581  float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
3582 
3583  // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
3584  m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
3585  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
3586  m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
3587 
3588  Vector2 margin = new Vector2(m_marginWidth != 0 ? m_marginWidth : k_LargePositiveFloat, k_LargePositiveFloat);
3589 
3590  if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
3591  {
3592  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3593  ParseInputText();
3594  }
3595 
3596  m_recursiveCount = 0;
3597  float preferredHeight = CalculatePreferredValues(fontSize, margin, !m_enableAutoSizing).y;
3598 
3599  m_isPreferredHeightDirty = false;
3600 
3601  //Debug.Log("GetPreferredHeight() Called. Returning height of " + preferredHeight);
3602 
3603  return preferredHeight;
3604  }
3605 
3606 
3612  protected float GetPreferredHeight(Vector2 margin)
3613  {
3614  float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
3615 
3616  // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
3617  m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
3618  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
3619  m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
3620 
3621  m_recursiveCount = 0;
3622  float preferredHeight = CalculatePreferredValues(fontSize, margin, true).y;
3623 
3624  //Debug.Log("GetPreferredHeight() Called. Returning height of " + preferredHeight);
3625 
3626  return preferredHeight;
3627  }
3628 
3629 
3634  public Vector2 GetRenderedValues()
3635  {
3636  return GetTextBounds().size;
3637  }
3638 
3644  public Vector2 GetRenderedValues(bool onlyVisibleCharacters)
3645  {
3646  return GetTextBounds(onlyVisibleCharacters).size;
3647  }
3648 
3649 
3654  protected float GetRenderedWidth()
3655  {
3656  return GetRenderedValues().x;
3657  }
3658 
3663  protected float GetRenderedWidth(bool onlyVisibleCharacters)
3664  {
3665  return GetRenderedValues(onlyVisibleCharacters).x;
3666  }
3667 
3672  protected float GetRenderedHeight()
3673  {
3674  return GetRenderedValues().y;
3675  }
3676 
3681  protected float GetRenderedHeight(bool onlyVisibleCharacters)
3682  {
3683  return GetRenderedValues(onlyVisibleCharacters).y;
3684  }
3685 
3686 
3691  protected virtual Vector2 CalculatePreferredValues(float defaultFontSize, Vector2 marginSize, bool ignoreTextAutoSizing)
3692  {
3693  //Debug.Log("*** CalculatePreferredValues() ***"); // ***** Frame: " + Time.frameCount);
3694 
3696 
3697  // Early exit if no font asset was assigned. This should not be needed since LiberationSans SDF will be assigned by default.
3698  if (m_fontAsset == null || m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
3699  {
3700  Debug.LogWarning("Can't Generate Mesh! No Font Asset has been assigned to Object ID: " + this.GetInstanceID());
3701 
3702  return Vector2.zero;
3703  }
3704 
3705  // Early exit if we don't have any Text to generate.
3706  if (m_TextParsingBuffer == null || m_TextParsingBuffer.Length == 0 || m_TextParsingBuffer[0].unicode == (char)0)
3707  {
3708  return Vector2.zero;
3709  }
3710 
3711  m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;
3712  m_currentMaterial = m_sharedMaterial;
3713  m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
3714  m_materialReferenceStack.SetDefault(new MaterialReference(0, m_currentFontAsset, null, m_currentMaterial, m_padding));
3715 
3716  // Total character count is computed when the text is parsed.
3717  int totalCharacterCount = m_totalCharacterCount; // m_VisibleCharacters.Count;
3718 
3719  if (m_internalCharacterInfo == null || totalCharacterCount > m_internalCharacterInfo.Length)
3720  {
3721  m_internalCharacterInfo = new TMP_CharacterInfo[totalCharacterCount > 1024 ? totalCharacterCount + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(totalCharacterCount)];
3722  }
3723 
3724  // Calculate the scale of the font based on selected font size and sampling point size.
3725  // baseScale is calculated using the font asset assigned to the text object.
3726  float baseScale = m_fontScale = (defaultFontSize / m_fontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_fontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
3727  float currentElementScale = baseScale;
3728  m_fontScaleMultiplier = 1;
3729 
3730  m_currentFontSize = defaultFontSize;
3731  m_sizeStack.SetDefault(m_currentFontSize);
3732  float fontSizeDelta = 0;
3733 
3734  int charCode = 0; // Holds the character code of the currently being processed character.
3735 
3736  m_FontStyleInternal = m_fontStyle; // Set the default style.
3737 
3738  m_lineJustification = m_textAlignment; // Sets the line justification mode to match editor alignment.
3739  m_lineJustificationStack.SetDefault(m_lineJustification);
3740 
3741  float bold_xAdvance_multiplier = 1; // Used to increase spacing between character when style is bold.
3742 
3743  m_baselineOffset = 0; // Used by subscript characters.
3744  m_baselineOffsetStack.Clear();
3745 
3746  m_lineOffset = 0; // Amount of space between lines (font line spacing + m_linespacing).
3747  m_lineHeight = TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET;
3748  float lineGap = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.lineHeight - (m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine - m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.descentLine);
3749 
3750  m_cSpacing = 0; // Amount of space added between characters as a result of the use of the <cspace> tag.
3751  m_monoSpacing = 0;
3752  float lineOffsetDelta = 0;
3753  m_xAdvance = 0; // Used to track the position of each character.
3754  float maxXAdvance = 0; // Used to determine Preferred Width.
3755 
3756  tag_LineIndent = 0; // Used for indentation of text.
3757  tag_Indent = 0;
3758  m_indentStack.SetDefault(0);
3759  tag_NoParsing = false;
3760  //m_isIgnoringAlignment = false;
3761 
3762  m_characterCount = 0; // Total characters in the char[]
3763 
3764 
3765  // Tracking of line information
3766  m_firstCharacterOfLine = 0;
3767  m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
3768  m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3769  m_lineNumber = 0;
3770 
3771  float marginWidth = marginSize.x;
3772  //float marginHeight = marginSize.y;
3773  m_marginLeft = 0;
3774  m_marginRight = 0;
3775  m_width = -1;
3776 
3777  // Used by Unity's Auto Layout system.
3778  float renderedWidth = 0;
3779  float renderedHeight = 0;
3780  float linebreakingWidth = 0;
3781  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
3782 
3783  // Tracking of the highest Ascender
3784  m_maxAscender = 0;
3785  m_maxDescender = 0;
3786 
3787 
3788  // Initialize struct to track states of word wrapping
3789  bool isFirstWord = true;
3790  bool isLastBreakingChar = false;
3791  WordWrapState savedLineState = new WordWrapState();
3792  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedLineState, 0, 0);
3793  WordWrapState savedWordWrapState = new WordWrapState();
3794  int wrappingIndex = 0;
3795 
3796  // Counter to prevent recursive lockup when computing preferred values.
3797  m_recursiveCount += 1;
3798 
3799  // Parse through Character buffer to read HTML tags and begin creating mesh.
3800  for (int i = 0; m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode != 0; i++)
3801  {
3802  charCode = (int)m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode;
3803 
3804  // Parse Rich Text Tag
3805  #region Parse Rich Text Tag
3806  if (m_isRichText && charCode == 60) // '<'
3807  {
3808  m_isParsingText = true;
3809  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
3810 
3811  // Check if Tag is valid. If valid, skip to the end of the validated tag.
3812  if (ValidateHtmlTag(m_TextParsingBuffer, i + 1, out int endTagIndex))
3813  {
3814  i = endTagIndex;
3815 
3816  // Continue to next character or handle the sprite element
3817  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
3818  continue;
3819  }
3820  }
3821  else
3822  {
3823  m_textElementType = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType;
3824  m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
3825  m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
3826  }
3827  #endregion End Parse Rich Text Tag
3828 
3829  int prev_MaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
3830  bool isUsingAltTypeface = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isUsingAlternateTypeface;
3831 
3832  m_isParsingText = false;
3833 
3834  // Handle Font Styles like LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps.
3835  #region Handling of LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps Font Styles
3836 
3837  float smallCapsMultiplier = 1.0f;
3838 
3839  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
3840  {
3841  if (/*(m_fontStyle & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase ||*/ (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase)
3842  {
3843  // If this character is lowercase, switch to uppercase.
3844  if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
3845  charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
3846 
3847  }
3848  else if (/*(m_fontStyle & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase ||*/ (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase)
3849  {
3850  // If this character is uppercase, switch to lowercase.
3851  if (char.IsUpper((char)charCode))
3852  charCode = char.ToLower((char)charCode);
3853  }
3854  else if (/*(m_fontStyle & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps ||*/ (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps)
3855  {
3856  if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
3857  {
3858  smallCapsMultiplier = 0.8f;
3859  charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
3860  }
3861  }
3862  }
3863  #endregion
3864 
3865 
3866  // Look up Character Data from Dictionary and cache it.
3867  #region Look up Character Data
3868  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
3869  {
3870  // If a sprite is used as a fallback then get a reference to it and set the color to white.
3871  m_currentSpriteAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset;
3872  m_spriteIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteIndex;
3873 
3874  TMP_SpriteCharacter sprite = m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
3875  if (sprite == null) continue;
3876 
3877  // Sprites are assigned in the E000 Private Area + sprite Index
3878  if (charCode == 60)
3879  charCode = 57344 + m_spriteIndex;
3880 
3881  m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;
3882 
3883  // The sprite scale calculations are based on the font asset assigned to the text object.
3884  // Sprite scale is used to determine line height
3885  // Current element scale represents a modified scale to normalize the sprite based on the font baseline to ascender.
3886  float spriteScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_fontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_fontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
3887  currentElementScale = m_fontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine / sprite.glyph.metrics.height * sprite.scale * spriteScale;
3888 
3889  m_cached_TextElement = sprite;
3890 
3891  m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
3892  m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].scale = spriteScale;
3893  //m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset = m_currentSpriteAsset;
3894  //m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
3895  //m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
3896 
3897  m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_MaterialIndex;
3898  }
3899  else if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
3900  {
3901  m_cached_TextElement = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement;
3902  if (m_cached_TextElement == null) continue;
3903 
3904  //m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
3905  //m_currentMaterial = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].material;
3906  m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
3907 
3908  // Re-calculate font scale as the font asset may have changed.
3909  m_fontScale = m_currentFontSize * smallCapsMultiplier / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
3910 
3911  currentElementScale = m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_cached_TextElement.scale;
3912 
3913  m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
3914 
3915  }
3916  #endregion
3917 
3918 
3919  // Handle Soft Hyphen
3920  #region Handle Soft Hyphen
3921  float old_scale = currentElementScale;
3922  if (charCode == 0xAD)
3923  {
3924  currentElementScale = 0;
3925  }
3926  #endregion
3927 
3928 
3929  // Store some of the text object's information
3930  m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)charCode;
3931 
3932 
3933  // Handle Kerning if Enabled.
3934  #region Handle Kerning
3935  TMP_GlyphValueRecord glyphAdjustments = new TMP_GlyphValueRecord();
3936  float characterSpacingAdjustment = m_characterSpacing;
3937  if (m_enableKerning)
3938  {
3939  if (m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1)
3940  {
3941  uint firstGlyphIndex = m_cached_TextElement.glyphIndex;
3942  uint secondGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].textElement.glyphIndex;
3943  long key = new GlyphPairKey(firstGlyphIndex, secondGlyphIndex).key;
3944 
3945  if (m_currentFontAsset.fontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out TMP_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecord adjustmentPair))
3946  {
3947  glyphAdjustments = adjustmentPair.firstAdjustmentRecord.glyphValueRecord;
3948  characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.featureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
3949  }
3950  }
3951 
3952  if (m_characterCount >= 1)
3953  {
3954  uint firstGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].textElement.glyphIndex;
3955  uint secondGlyphIndex = m_cached_TextElement.glyphIndex;
3956  long key = new GlyphPairKey(firstGlyphIndex, secondGlyphIndex).key;
3957 
3958  if (m_currentFontAsset.fontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out TMP_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecord adjustmentPair))
3959  {
3960  glyphAdjustments += adjustmentPair.secondAdjustmentRecord.glyphValueRecord;
3961  characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.featureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
3962  }
3963  }
3964  }
3965  #endregion
3966 
3967 
3968  // Initial Implementation for RTL support.
3969  #region Handle Right-to-Left
3970  //if (m_isRightToLeft)
3971  //{
3972  // m_xAdvance -= ((m_cached_TextElement.xAdvance * bold_xAdvance_multiplier + m_characterSpacing + m_wordSpacing + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset) * currentElementScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
3973 
3974  // if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
3975  // m_xAdvance -= m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
3976  //}
3977  #endregion
3978 
3979 
3980  // Handle Mono Spacing
3981  #region Handle Mono Spacing
3982  float monoAdvance = 0;
3983  if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
3984  {
3985  monoAdvance = (m_monoSpacing / 2 - (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.width / 2 + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingX) * currentElementScale);
3986  m_xAdvance += monoAdvance;
3987  }
3988  #endregion
3989 
3990 
3991  // Set Padding based on selected font style
3992  #region Handle Style Padding
3993  if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character && !isUsingAltTypeface && ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold)) // Checks for any combination of Bold Style.
3994  {
3995  bold_xAdvance_multiplier = 1 + m_currentFontAsset.boldSpacing * 0.01f;
3996  }
3997  else
3998  {
3999  //style_padding = m_currentFontAsset.normalStyle * 2;
4000  bold_xAdvance_multiplier = 1.0f;
4001  }
4002  #endregion Handle Style Padding
4003 
4004  m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine = 0 - m_lineOffset + m_baselineOffset;
4005 
4006 
4007  // Compute and save text element Ascender and maximum line Ascender.
4008  float elementAscender = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine * (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character ? currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier : m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].scale) + m_baselineOffset;
4009  m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender = elementAscender - m_lineOffset;
4010  m_maxLineAscender = elementAscender > m_maxLineAscender ? elementAscender : m_maxLineAscender;
4011 
4012  // Compute and save text element Descender and maximum line Descender.
4013  float elementDescender = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.descentLine * (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character ? currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier: m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].scale) + m_baselineOffset;
4014  float elementDescenderII = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].descender = elementDescender - m_lineOffset;
4015  m_maxLineDescender = elementDescender < m_maxLineDescender ? elementDescender : m_maxLineDescender;
4016 
4017  // Adjust maxLineAscender and maxLineDescender if style is superscript or subscript
4018  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Subscript) == FontStyles.Subscript || (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Superscript) == FontStyles.Superscript)
4019  {
4020  float baseAscender = (elementAscender - m_baselineOffset) / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize;
4021  elementAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
4022  m_maxLineAscender = baseAscender > m_maxLineAscender ? baseAscender : m_maxLineAscender;
4023 
4024  float baseDescender = (elementDescender - m_baselineOffset) / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize;
4025  elementDescender = m_maxLineDescender;
4026  m_maxLineDescender = baseDescender < m_maxLineDescender ? baseDescender : m_maxLineDescender;
4027  }
4028 
4029  if (m_lineNumber == 0) m_maxAscender = m_maxAscender > elementAscender ? m_maxAscender : elementAscender;
4030  //if (m_lineOffset == 0) pageAscender = pageAscender > elementAscender ? pageAscender : elementAscender;
4031 
4032  // Setup Mesh for visible text elements. ie. not a SPACE / LINEFEED / CARRIAGE RETURN.
4033  #region Handle Visible Characters
4034  if (charCode == 9 || charCode == 0xA0 || charCode == 0x2007 || (!char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) && charCode != 0x200B) || m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
4035  {
4036  // Check if Character exceeds the width of the Text Container
4037  #region Handle Line Breaking, Text Auto-Sizing and Horizontal Overflow
4038  float width = m_width != -1 ? Mathf.Min(marginWidth + 0.0001f - m_marginLeft - m_marginRight, m_width) : marginWidth + 0.0001f - m_marginLeft - m_marginRight;
4039 
4040  bool isJustifiedOrFlush = ((_HorizontalAlignmentOptions)m_lineJustification & _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush) == _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush || ((_HorizontalAlignmentOptions)m_lineJustification & _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified) == _HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified;
4041 
4042  // Calculate the line breaking width of the text.
4043  linebreakingWidth = m_xAdvance + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalAdvance * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta) * (charCode != 0xAD ? currentElementScale : old_scale);
4044 
4045  // Check if Character exceeds the width of the Text Container
4046  if (linebreakingWidth > width * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f))
4047  {
4048  // Word Wrapping
4049  #region Handle Word Wrapping
4050  if (enableWordWrapping && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine)
4051  {
4052  // Check if word wrapping is still possible
4053  #region Line Breaking Check
4054  if (wrappingIndex == savedWordWrapState.previous_WordBreak || isFirstWord)
4055  {
4056  // Word wrapping is no longer possible. Shrink size of text if auto-sizing is enabled.
4057  #region Text Auto-Sizing
4058  if (ignoreTextAutoSizing == false && m_currentFontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
4059  {
4060  // Handle Character Width Adjustments
4061  #region Character Width Adjustments
4062  if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
4063  {
4064  m_recursiveCount = 0;
4065  m_charWidthAdjDelta += 0.01f;
4066  return CalculatePreferredValues(defaultFontSize, marginSize, false);
4067  }
4068  #endregion
4069 
4070  // Adjust Point Size
4071  m_maxFontSize = defaultFontSize;
4072 
4073  defaultFontSize -= Mathf.Max((defaultFontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
4074  defaultFontSize = (int)(Mathf.Max(defaultFontSize, m_fontSizeMin) * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f;
4075 
4076  if (m_recursiveCount > 20) return new Vector2(renderedWidth, renderedHeight);
4077  return CalculatePreferredValues(defaultFontSize, marginSize, false);
4078  }
4079  #endregion
4080 
4081  // Word wrapping is no longer possible, now breaking up individual words.
4082  if (m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled == false)
4083  {
4084  m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled = true;
4085  }
4086  else
4087  isLastBreakingChar = true;
4088  }
4089  #endregion
4090 
4091  // Restore to previously stored state of last valid (space character or linefeed)
4092  i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref savedWordWrapState);
4093  wrappingIndex = i; // Used to detect when line length can no longer be reduced.
4094 
4095  // Handling for Soft Hyphen
4096  if (m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode == 0xAD) // && !m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled) // && ellipsisIndex != i && !m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled)
4097  {
4098  m_isTextTruncated = true;
4099  m_TextParsingBuffer[i].unicode = 0x2D;
4100  return CalculatePreferredValues(defaultFontSize, marginSize, true);
4101  }
4102 
4103  // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
4104  if (m_lineNumber > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
4105  {
4106  //Debug.Log("(1) Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
