4107  float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
4108  //AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
4109  m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
4110  savedWordWrapState.lineOffset = m_lineOffset;
4111  savedWordWrapState.previousLineAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
4112 
4113  // TODO - Add check for character exceeding vertical bounds
4114  }
4115  //m_isNewPage = false;
4116 
4117  // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
4118  float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
4119  float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
4120 
4121 
4122  // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
4123  m_maxDescender = m_maxDescender < lineDescender ? m_maxDescender : lineDescender;
4124 
4125 
4126  m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount; // Store first character of the next line.
4127 
4128  // Compute Preferred Width & Height
4129  renderedWidth += m_xAdvance;
4130 
4131  if (m_enableWordWrapping)
4132  renderedHeight = m_maxAscender - m_maxDescender;
4133  else
4134  renderedHeight = Mathf.Max(renderedHeight, lineAscender - lineDescender);
4135 
4136 
4137  // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
4138  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedLineState, i, m_characterCount - 1);
4139 
4140  m_lineNumber += 1;
4141  //isStartOfNewLine = true;
4142 
4143  // Check to make sure Array is large enough to hold a new line.
4144  //if (m_lineNumber >= m_internalTextInfo.lineInfo.Length)
4145  // ResizeLineExtents(m_lineNumber);
4146 
4147  // Apply Line Spacing based on scale of the last character of the line.
4148  if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
4149  {
4150  float ascender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender - m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine;
4151  lineOffsetDelta = 0 - m_maxLineDescender + ascender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacing + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale;
4152  m_lineOffset += lineOffsetDelta;
4153 
4154  m_startOfLineAscender = ascender;
4155  }
4156  else
4157  m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + m_lineSpacing * baseScale;
4158 
4159  m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
4160  m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
4161 
4162  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
4163 
4164  continue;
4165  }
4166  #endregion End Word Wrapping
4167 
4168  // Text Auto-Sizing (text exceeding Width of container.
4169  #region Handle Text Auto-Sizing
4170  if (ignoreTextAutoSizing == false && defaultFontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
4171  {
4172  // Handle Character Width Adjustments
4173  #region Character Width Adjustments
4174  if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
4175  {
4176  m_recursiveCount = 0;
4177  m_charWidthAdjDelta += 0.01f;
4178  return CalculatePreferredValues(defaultFontSize, marginSize, false);
4179  }
4180  #endregion
4181 
4182  // Adjust Point Size
4183  m_maxFontSize = defaultFontSize;
4184 
4185  defaultFontSize -= Mathf.Max((defaultFontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
4186  defaultFontSize = (int)(Mathf.Max(defaultFontSize, m_fontSizeMin) * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f;
4187 
4188  if (m_recursiveCount > 20) return new Vector2(renderedWidth, renderedHeight);
4189  return CalculatePreferredValues(defaultFontSize, marginSize, false);
4190  }
4191  #endregion End Text Auto-Sizing
4192  }
4193  #endregion End Check for Characters Exceeding Width of Text Container
4194 
4195  }
4196  #endregion Handle Visible Characters
4197 
4198 
4199  // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
4200  #region Adjust Line Spacing
4201  if (m_lineNumber > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET && !m_isNewPage)
4202  {
4203  //Debug.Log("Inline - Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
4204  //float gap = 0; // Compute gap.
4205 
4206  float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
4207  //AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
4208  elementDescenderII -= offsetDelta;
4209  m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
4210 
4211  m_startOfLineAscender += offsetDelta;
4212  savedWordWrapState.lineOffset = m_lineOffset;
4213  savedWordWrapState.previousLineAscender = m_startOfLineAscender;
4214  }
4215  #endregion
4216 
4217 
4218  // Check if text Exceeds the vertical bounds of the margin area.
4219  #region Check Vertical Bounds & Auto-Sizing
4220  /*
4221  if (m_maxAscender - elementDescenderII > marginHeight + 0.0001f)
4222  {
4223  // Handle Line spacing adjustments
4224  #region Line Spacing Adjustments
4225  if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_lineSpacingDelta > m_lineSpacingMax && m_lineNumber > 0)
4226  {
4227  //loopCountA = 0;
4228 
4229  //m_lineSpacingDelta -= 1;
4230  //GenerateTextMesh();
4231  //return;
4232  }
4233  #endregion
4234 
4235 
4236  // Handle Text Auto-sizing resulting from text exceeding vertical bounds.
4237  #region Text Auto-Sizing (Text greater than vertical bounds)
4238  if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
4239  {
4240  m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
4241 
4242  m_fontSize -= Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
4243  m_fontSize = (int)(Mathf.Max(m_fontSize, m_fontSizeMin) * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f;
4244 
4245  //m_recursiveCount = 0;
4246  //if (loopCountA > 20) return; // Added to debug
4247  CalculatePreferredValues(m_fontSize, marginSize, false);
4248  return Vector2.zero;
4249  }
4250  #endregion Text Auto-Sizing
4251  }
4252  */
4253  #endregion Check Vertical Bounds
4254 
4255 
4256  // Handle xAdvance & Tabulation Stops. Tab stops at every 25% of Font Size.
4257  #region XAdvance, Tabulation & Stops
4258  if (charCode == 9)
4259  {
4260  float tabSize = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.tabWidth * currentElementScale;
4261  float tabs = Mathf.Ceil(m_xAdvance / tabSize) * tabSize;
4262  m_xAdvance = tabs > m_xAdvance ? tabs : m_xAdvance + tabSize;
4263  }
4264  else if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
4265  {
4266  m_xAdvance += (m_monoSpacing - monoAdvance + ((characterSpacingAdjustment + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset) * currentElementScale) + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
4267 
4268  if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
4269  m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
4270  }
4271  else
4272  {
4273  m_xAdvance += ((m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalAdvance * bold_xAdvance_multiplier + characterSpacingAdjustment + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + glyphAdjustments.xAdvance) * currentElementScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
4274 
4275  if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
4276  m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
4277  }
4278 
4279 
4280  #endregion Tabulation & Stops
4281 
4282 
4283  // Handle Carriage Return
4284  #region Carriage Return
4285  if (charCode == 13)
4286  {
4287  maxXAdvance = Mathf.Max(maxXAdvance, renderedWidth + m_xAdvance);
4288  renderedWidth = 0;
4289  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
4290  }
4291  #endregion Carriage Return
4292 
4293 
4294  // Handle Line Spacing Adjustments + Word Wrapping & special case for last line.
4295  #region Check for Line Feed and Last Character
4296  if (charCode == 10 || m_characterCount == totalCharacterCount - 1)
4297  {
4298  // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
4299  if (m_lineNumber > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
4300  {
4301  //Debug.Log("(2) Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
4302  float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
4303  //AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
4304  elementDescenderII -= offsetDelta;
4305  m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
4306  }
4307 
4308  // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
4309  //float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
4310  float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
4311 
4312  // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
4313  m_maxDescender = m_maxDescender < lineDescender ? m_maxDescender : lineDescender;
4314 
4315  m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount + 1;
4316 
4317  // Store PreferredWidth paying attention to linefeed and last character of text.
4318  if (charCode == 10 && m_characterCount != totalCharacterCount - 1)
4319  {
4320  maxXAdvance = Mathf.Max(maxXAdvance, renderedWidth + linebreakingWidth);
4321  renderedWidth = 0;
4322  }
4323  else
4324  renderedWidth = Mathf.Max(maxXAdvance, renderedWidth + linebreakingWidth);
4325 
4326 
4327  renderedHeight = m_maxAscender - m_maxDescender;
4328 
4329 
4330  // Add new line if not last lines or character.
4331  if (charCode == 10)
4332  {
4333  // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
4334  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedLineState, i, m_characterCount);
4335  // Store the state of the last Character before the new line.
4336  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
4337 
4338  m_lineNumber += 1;
4339 
4340  // Apply Line Spacing
4341  if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
4342  {
4343  lineOffsetDelta = 0 - m_maxLineDescender + elementAscender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacing + m_paragraphSpacing + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale;
4344  m_lineOffset += lineOffsetDelta;
4345  }
4346  else
4347  m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + (m_lineSpacing + m_paragraphSpacing) * baseScale;
4348 
4349  m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
4350  m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
4351  m_startOfLineAscender = elementAscender;
4352 
4353  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_LineIndent + tag_Indent;
4354 
4355  m_characterCount += 1;
4356  continue;
4357  }
4358  }
4359  #endregion Check for Linefeed or Last Character
4360 
4361 
4362  // Save State of Mesh Creation for handling of Word Wrapping
4363  #region Save Word Wrapping State
4364  if (m_enableWordWrapping || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Truncate || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis)
4365  {
4366  if ((char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B || charCode == 0x2D || charCode == 0xAD) && !m_isNonBreakingSpace && charCode != 0xA0 && charCode != 0x2011 && charCode != 0x202F && charCode != 0x2060)
4367  {
4368  // We store the state of numerous variables for the most recent Space, LineFeed or Carriage Return to enable them to be restored
4369  // for Word Wrapping.
4370  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
4371  m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled = false;
4372  isFirstWord = false;
4373  }
4374  // Handling for East Asian languages
4375  else if ((charCode > 0x1100 && charCode < 0x11ff || /* Hangul Jamo */
4376  charCode > 0x2E80 && charCode < 0x9FFF || /* CJK */
4377  charCode > 0xA960 && charCode < 0xA97F || /* Hangul Jame Extended-A */
4378  charCode > 0xAC00 && charCode < 0xD7FF || /* Hangul Syllables */
4379  charCode > 0xF900 && charCode < 0xFAFF || /* CJK Compatibility Ideographs */
4380  charCode > 0xFE30 && charCode < 0xFE4F || /* CJK Compatibility Forms */
4381  charCode > 0xFF00 && charCode < 0xFFEF) /* CJK Halfwidth */
4382  && !m_isNonBreakingSpace)
4383  {
4384  if (isFirstWord || isLastBreakingChar || TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.leadingCharacters.ContainsKey(charCode) == false &&
4385  (m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1 &&
4386  TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.followingCharacters.ContainsKey(m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].character) == false))
4387  {
4388  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
4389  m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled = false;
4390  isFirstWord = false;
4391  }
4392  }
4393  else if ((isFirstWord || m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled == true || isLastBreakingChar))
4394  SaveWordWrappingState(ref savedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
4395  }
4396  #endregion Save Word Wrapping State
4397 
4398  m_characterCount += 1;
4399  }
4400 
4401  // Check Auto Sizing and increase font size to fill text container.
4402  #region Check Auto-Sizing (Upper Font Size Bounds)
4403  fontSizeDelta = m_maxFontSize - m_minFontSize;
4404  if (!m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled && ignoreTextAutoSizing == false && fontSizeDelta > 0.051f && defaultFontSize < m_fontSizeMax)
4405  {
4406  m_minFontSize = defaultFontSize;
4407  defaultFontSize += Mathf.Max((m_maxFontSize - defaultFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
4408  defaultFontSize = (int)(Mathf.Min(defaultFontSize, m_fontSizeMax) * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f;
4409 
4410  if (m_recursiveCount > 20) return new Vector2(renderedWidth, renderedHeight);
4411  return CalculatePreferredValues(defaultFontSize, marginSize, false);
4412  }
4413  #endregion End Auto-sizing Check
4414 
4415 
4416  m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled = false;
4417  m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = false;
4418 
4419  // Adjust Preferred Width and Height to account for Margins.
4420  renderedWidth += m_margin.x > 0 ? m_margin.x : 0;
4421  renderedWidth += m_margin.z > 0 ? m_margin.z : 0;
4422 
4423  renderedHeight += m_margin.y > 0 ? m_margin.y : 0;
4424  renderedHeight += m_margin.w > 0 ? m_margin.w : 0;
4425 
4426  // Round Preferred Values to nearest 5/100.
4427  renderedWidth = (int)(renderedWidth * 100 + 1f) / 100f;
4428  renderedHeight = (int)(renderedHeight * 100 + 1f) / 100f;
4429 
4430  //Debug.Log("Preferred Values: (" + renderedWidth + ", " + renderedHeight + ") with Recursive count of " + m_recursiveCount);
4431 
4433  return new Vector2(renderedWidth, renderedHeight);
4434  }
4435 
4436 
4441  protected virtual Bounds GetCompoundBounds() { return new Bounds(); }
4442 
4443 
4448  protected Bounds GetTextBounds()
4449  {
4450  if (m_textInfo == null || m_textInfo.characterCount > m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length) return new Bounds();
4451 
4452  Extents extent = new Extents(k_LargePositiveVector2, k_LargeNegativeVector2);
4453 
4454  for (int i = 0; i < m_textInfo.characterCount && i < m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length; i++)
4455  {
4456  if (!m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].isVisible) continue;
4457 
4458  extent.min.x = Mathf.Min(extent.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.x);
4459  extent.min.y = Mathf.Min(extent.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender);
4460 
4461  extent.max.x = Mathf.Max(extent.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].xAdvance);
4462  extent.max.y = Mathf.Max(extent.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender);
4463  }
4464 
4465  Vector2 size;
4466  size.x = extent.max.x - extent.min.x;
4467  size.y = extent.max.y - extent.min.y;
4468 
4469  Vector3 center = (extent.min + extent.max) / 2;
4470 
4471  return new Bounds(center, size);
4472  }
4473 
4474 
4480  protected Bounds GetTextBounds(bool onlyVisibleCharacters)
4481  {
4482  if (m_textInfo == null) return new Bounds();
4483 
4484  Extents extent = new Extents(k_LargePositiveVector2, k_LargeNegativeVector2);
4485 
4486  for (int i = 0; i < m_textInfo.characterCount; i++)
4487  {
4488  if ((i > maxVisibleCharacters || m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].lineNumber > m_maxVisibleLines) && onlyVisibleCharacters) break;
4489 
4490  if (onlyVisibleCharacters && !m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].isVisible) continue;
4491 
4492  extent.min.x = Mathf.Min(extent.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].origin);
4493  extent.min.y = Mathf.Min(extent.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender);
4494 
4495  extent.max.x = Mathf.Max(extent.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].xAdvance);
4496  extent.max.y = Mathf.Max(extent.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender);
4497  }
4498 
4499  Vector2 size;
4500  size.x = extent.max.x - extent.min.x;
4501  size.y = extent.max.y - extent.min.y;
4502 
4503  Vector2 center = (extent.min + extent.max) / 2;
4504 
4505  return new Bounds(center, size);
4506  }
4507 
4508 
4515  protected virtual void AdjustLineOffset(int startIndex, int endIndex, float offset) { }
4516 
4517 
4522  protected void ResizeLineExtents(int size)
4523  {
4524  size = size > 1024 ? size + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(size + 1);
4525 
4526  TMP_LineInfo[] temp_lineInfo = new TMP_LineInfo[size];
4527  for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
4528  {
4529  if (i < m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
4530  temp_lineInfo[i] = m_textInfo.lineInfo[i];
4531  else
4532  {
4533  temp_lineInfo[i].lineExtents.min = k_LargePositiveVector2;
4534  temp_lineInfo[i].lineExtents.max = k_LargeNegativeVector2;
4535 
4536  temp_lineInfo[i].ascender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
4537  temp_lineInfo[i].descender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
4538  }
4539  }
4540 
4541  m_textInfo.lineInfo = temp_lineInfo;
4542  }
4543  protected static Vector2 k_LargePositiveVector2 = new Vector2(TMP_Math.INT_MAX, TMP_Math.INT_MAX);
4544  protected static Vector2 k_LargeNegativeVector2 = new Vector2(TMP_Math.INT_MIN, TMP_Math.INT_MIN);
4545  protected static float k_LargePositiveFloat = TMP_Math.FLOAT_MAX;
4546  protected static float k_LargeNegativeFloat = TMP_Math.FLOAT_MIN;
4547  protected static int k_LargePositiveInt = TMP_Math.INT_MAX;
4548  protected static int k_LargeNegativeInt = TMP_Math.INT_MIN;
4549 
4555  public virtual TMP_TextInfo GetTextInfo(string text) { return null; }
4556 
4557 
4561  public virtual void ComputeMarginSize() { }
4562 
4563 
4569  //protected int GetArraySizes(int[] chars)
4570  //{
4571  // //Debug.Log("Set Array Size called.");
4572 
4573  // //int visibleCount = 0;
4574  // //int totalCount = 0;
4575  // int tagEnd = 0;
4576 
4577  // m_totalCharacterCount = 0;
4578  // m_isUsingBold = false;
4579  // m_isParsingText = false;
4580 
4581 
4582  // //m_VisibleCharacters.Clear();
4583 
4584  // for (int i = 0; chars[i] != 0; i++)
4585  // {
4586  // int c = chars[i];
4587 
4588  // if (m_isRichText && c == 60) // if Char '<'
4589  // {
4590  // // Check if Tag is Valid
4591  // if (ValidateHtmlTag(chars, i + 1, out tagEnd))
4592  // {
4593  // i = tagEnd;
4594  // //if ((m_style & FontStyles.Underline) == FontStyles.Underline) visibleCount += 3;
4595 
4596  // if ((m_style & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold) m_isUsingBold = true;
4597 
4598  // continue;
4599  // }
4600  // }
4601 
4602  // //if (!char.IsWhiteSpace((char)c) && c != 0x200B)
4603  // //{
4604  // //visibleCount += 1;
4605  // //}
4606 
4607  // //m_VisibleCharacters.Add((char)c);
4608  // m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
4609  // }
4610 
4611  // return m_totalCharacterCount;
4612  //}
4613 
4614 
4621  protected void SaveWordWrappingState(ref WordWrapState state, int index, int count)
4622  {
4623  // Multi Font & Material support related
4624  state.currentFontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
4625  state.currentSpriteAsset = m_currentSpriteAsset;
4626  state.currentMaterial = m_currentMaterial;
4627  state.currentMaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
4628 
4629  state.previous_WordBreak = index;
4630  state.total_CharacterCount = count;
4631  state.visible_CharacterCount = m_lineVisibleCharacterCount;
4632  //state.visible_CharacterCount = m_visibleCharacterCount;
4633  //state.visible_SpriteCount = m_visibleSpriteCount;
4634  state.visible_LinkCount = m_textInfo.linkCount;
4635 
4636  state.firstCharacterIndex = m_firstCharacterOfLine;
4637  state.firstVisibleCharacterIndex = m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine;
4638  state.lastVisibleCharIndex = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine;
4639 
4640  state.fontStyle = m_FontStyleInternal;
4641  state.fontScale = m_fontScale;
4642  //state.maxFontScale = m_maxFontScale;
4643  state.fontScaleMultiplier = m_fontScaleMultiplier;
4644  state.currentFontSize = m_currentFontSize;
4645 
4646  state.xAdvance = m_xAdvance;
4647  state.maxCapHeight = m_maxCapHeight;
4648  state.maxAscender = m_maxAscender;
4649  state.maxDescender = m_maxDescender;
4650  state.maxLineAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
4651  state.maxLineDescender = m_maxLineDescender;
4652  state.previousLineAscender = m_startOfLineAscender;
4653  state.preferredWidth = m_preferredWidth;
4654  state.preferredHeight = m_preferredHeight;
4655  state.meshExtents = m_meshExtents;
4656 
4657  state.lineNumber = m_lineNumber;
4658  state.lineOffset = m_lineOffset;
4659  state.baselineOffset = m_baselineOffset;
4660 
4661  //state.alignment = m_lineJustification;
4662  state.vertexColor = m_htmlColor;
4663  state.underlineColor = m_underlineColor;
4664  state.strikethroughColor = m_strikethroughColor;
4665  state.highlightColor = m_highlightColor;
4666 
4667  state.isNonBreakingSpace = m_isNonBreakingSpace;
4668  state.tagNoParsing = tag_NoParsing;
4669 
4670  // XML Tag Stack
4671  state.basicStyleStack = m_fontStyleStack;
4672  state.colorStack = m_colorStack;
4673  state.underlineColorStack = m_underlineColorStack;
4674  state.strikethroughColorStack = m_strikethroughColorStack;
4675  state.highlightColorStack = m_highlightColorStack;
4676  state.colorGradientStack = m_colorGradientStack;
4677  state.sizeStack = m_sizeStack;
4678  state.indentStack = m_indentStack;
4679  state.fontWeightStack = m_FontWeightStack;
4680  state.styleStack = m_styleStack;
4681  state.baselineStack = m_baselineOffsetStack;
4682  state.actionStack = m_actionStack;
4683  state.materialReferenceStack = m_materialReferenceStack;
4684  state.lineJustificationStack = m_lineJustificationStack;
4685  //state.spriteAnimationStack = m_spriteAnimationStack;
4686 
4687  state.spriteAnimationID = m_spriteAnimationID;
4688 
4689  if (m_lineNumber < m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
4690  state.lineInfo = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber];
4691  }
4692 
4693 
4699  protected int RestoreWordWrappingState(ref WordWrapState state)
4700  {
4701  int index = state.previous_WordBreak;
4702 
4703  // Multi Font & Material support related
4704  m_currentFontAsset = state.currentFontAsset;
4705  m_currentSpriteAsset = state.currentSpriteAsset;
4706  m_currentMaterial = state.currentMaterial;
4707  m_currentMaterialIndex = state.currentMaterialIndex;
4708 
4709  m_characterCount = state.total_CharacterCount + 1;
4710  m_lineVisibleCharacterCount = state.visible_CharacterCount;
4711  //m_visibleCharacterCount = state.visible_CharacterCount;
4712  //m_visibleSpriteCount = state.visible_SpriteCount;
4713  m_textInfo.linkCount = state.visible_LinkCount;
4714 
4715  m_firstCharacterOfLine = state.firstCharacterIndex;
4716  m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = state.firstVisibleCharacterIndex;
4717  m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = state.lastVisibleCharIndex;
4718 
4719  m_FontStyleInternal = state.fontStyle;
4720  m_fontScale = state.fontScale;
4721  m_fontScaleMultiplier = state.fontScaleMultiplier;
4722  //m_maxFontScale = state.maxFontScale;
4723  m_currentFontSize = state.currentFontSize;
4724 
4725  m_xAdvance = state.xAdvance;
4726  m_maxCapHeight = state.maxCapHeight;
4727  m_maxAscender = state.maxAscender;
4728  m_maxDescender = state.maxDescender;
4729  m_maxLineAscender = state.maxLineAscender;
4730  m_maxLineDescender = state.maxLineDescender;
4731  m_startOfLineAscender = state.previousLineAscender;
4732  m_preferredWidth = state.preferredWidth;
4733  m_preferredHeight = state.preferredHeight;
4734  m_meshExtents = state.meshExtents;
4735 
4736  m_lineNumber = state.lineNumber;
4737  m_lineOffset = state.lineOffset;
4738  m_baselineOffset = state.baselineOffset;
4739 
4740  //m_lineJustification = state.alignment;
4741  m_htmlColor = state.vertexColor;
4742  m_underlineColor = state.underlineColor;
4743  m_strikethroughColor = state.strikethroughColor;
4744  m_highlightColor = state.highlightColor;
4745 
4746  m_isNonBreakingSpace = state.isNonBreakingSpace;
4747  tag_NoParsing = state.tagNoParsing;
4748 
4749  // XML Tag Stack
4750  m_fontStyleStack = state.basicStyleStack;
4751  m_colorStack = state.colorStack;
4752  m_underlineColorStack = state.underlineColorStack;
4753  m_strikethroughColorStack = state.strikethroughColorStack;
4754  m_highlightColorStack = state.highlightColorStack;
4755  m_colorGradientStack = state.colorGradientStack;
4756  m_sizeStack = state.sizeStack;
4757  m_indentStack = state.indentStack;
4758  m_FontWeightStack = state.fontWeightStack;
4759  m_styleStack = state.styleStack;
4760  m_baselineOffsetStack = state.baselineStack;
4761  m_actionStack = state.actionStack;
4762  m_materialReferenceStack = state.materialReferenceStack;
4763  m_lineJustificationStack = state.lineJustificationStack;
4764  //m_spriteAnimationStack = state.spriteAnimationStack;
4765 
4766  m_spriteAnimationID = state.spriteAnimationID;
4767 
4768  if (m_lineNumber < m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
4769  m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber] = state.lineInfo;
4770 
4771  return index;
4772  }
4773 
4774 
4780  protected virtual void SaveGlyphVertexInfo(float padding, float style_padding, Color32 vertexColor)
4781  {
4782  // Save the Vertex Position for the Character
4783  #region Setup Mesh Vertices
4784  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft;
4785  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topLeft;
4786  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight;
4787  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomRight;
4788  #endregion
4789 
4790 
4791  #region Setup Vertex Colors
4792  // Alpha is the lower of the vertex color or tag color alpha used.
4793  vertexColor.a = m_fontColor32.a < vertexColor.a ? (byte)(m_fontColor32.a) : (byte)(vertexColor.a);
4794 
4795  // Handle Vertex Colors & Vertex Color Gradient
4796  if (!m_enableVertexGradient)
4797  {
4798  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = vertexColor;
4799  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = vertexColor;
4800  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = vertexColor;
4801  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = vertexColor;
4802  }
4803  else
4804  {
4805  if (!m_overrideHtmlColors && m_colorStack.m_Index > 1)
4806  {
4807  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = vertexColor;
4808  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = vertexColor;
4809  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = vertexColor;
4810  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = vertexColor;
4811  }
4812  else // Handle Vertex Color Gradient
4813  {
4814  // Use Vertex Color Gradient Preset (if one is assigned)
4815  if (m_fontColorGradientPreset != null)
4816  {
4817  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomLeft * vertexColor;
4818  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.topLeft * vertexColor;
4819  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.topRight * vertexColor;
4820  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomRight * vertexColor;
4821  }
4822  else
4823  {
4824  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = m_fontColorGradient.bottomLeft * vertexColor;
4825  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = m_fontColorGradient.topLeft * vertexColor;
4826  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = m_fontColorGradient.topRight * vertexColor;
4827  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = m_fontColorGradient.bottomRight * vertexColor;
4828  }
4829  }
4830  }
4831 
4832  if (m_colorGradientPreset != null)
4833  {
4834  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.bottomLeft;
4835  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.topLeft;
4836  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.topRight;
4837  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.bottomRight;
4838  }
4839  #endregion
4840 
4841  // Apply style_padding only if this is a SDF Shader.
4842  if (!m_isSDFShader)
4843  style_padding = 0f;
4844 
4845 
4846  // Setup UVs for the Character
4847  #region Setup UVs
4848 
4849  Vector2 uv0;
4850  uv0.x = (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.x - padding - style_padding) / m_currentFontAsset.atlasWidth;
4851  uv0.y = (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.y - padding - style_padding) / m_currentFontAsset.atlasHeight;
4852 
4853  Vector2 uv1;
4854  uv1.x = uv0.x;
4855  uv1.y = (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.y + padding + style_padding + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.height) / m_currentFontAsset.atlasHeight;
4856 
4857  Vector2 uv2;
4858  uv2.x = (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.x + padding + style_padding + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.width) / m_currentFontAsset.atlasWidth;
4859  uv2.y = uv1.y;
4860 
4861  Vector2 uv3;
4862  uv3.x = uv2.x;
4863  uv3.y = uv0.y;
4864 
4865  // Store UV Information
4866  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.uv = uv0;
4867  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.uv = uv1;
4868  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.uv = uv2;
4869  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.uv = uv3;
4870  #endregion Setup UVs
4871 
4872 
4873  // Normal
4874  #region Setup Normals & Tangents
4875  //Vector3 normal = new Vector3(0, 0, -1);
4876  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.normal = normal;
4877  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.normal = normal;
4878  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.normal = normal;
4879  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.normal = normal;
4880 
4881  // Tangents
4882  //Vector4 tangent = new Vector4(-1, 0, 0, 1);
4883  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.tangent = tangent;
4884  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.tangent = tangent;
4885  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.tangent = tangent;
4886  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.tangent = tangent;
4887  #endregion end Normals & Tangents
4888  }
4889 
4890 
4897  protected virtual void SaveSpriteVertexInfo(Color32 vertexColor)
4898  {
4899  // Save the Vertex Position for the Character
4900  #region Setup Mesh Vertices
4901  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft;
4902  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topLeft;
4903  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight;
4904  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomRight;
4905  #endregion
4906 
4907  // Vertex Color Alpha
4908  if (m_tintAllSprites) m_tintSprite = true;
4909  Color32 spriteColor = m_tintSprite ? m_spriteColor.Multiply(vertexColor) : m_spriteColor;
4910  spriteColor.a = spriteColor.a < m_fontColor32.a ? spriteColor.a = spriteColor.a < vertexColor.a ? spriteColor.a : vertexColor.a : m_fontColor32.a;
4911 
4912  Color32 c0 = spriteColor;
4913  Color32 c1 = spriteColor;
4914  Color32 c2 = spriteColor;
4915  Color32 c3 = spriteColor;
4916 
4917  if (m_enableVertexGradient)
4918  {
4919  if (m_fontColorGradientPreset != null)
4920  {
4921  c0 = m_tintSprite ? c0.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomLeft) : c0;
4922  c1 = m_tintSprite ? c1.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.topLeft) : c1;
4923  c2 = m_tintSprite ? c2.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.topRight) : c2;
4924  c3 = m_tintSprite ? c3.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomRight) : c3;
4925  }
4926  else
4927  {
4928  c0 = m_tintSprite ? c0.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.bottomLeft) : c0;
4929  c1 = m_tintSprite ? c1.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.topLeft) : c1;
4930  c2 = m_tintSprite ? c2.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.topRight) : c2;
4931  c3 = m_tintSprite ? c3.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.bottomRight) : c3;
4932  }
4933  }
4934 
4935  if (m_colorGradientPreset != null)
4936  {
4937  c0 = m_tintSprite ? c0.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.bottomLeft) : c0;
4938  c1 = m_tintSprite ? c1.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.topLeft) : c1;
4939  c2 = m_tintSprite ? c2.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.topRight) : c2;
4940  c3 = m_tintSprite ? c3.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.bottomRight) : c3;
4941  }
4942 
4943  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = c0;
4944  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = c1;
4945  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = c2;
4946  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = c3;
4947 
4948 
4949  // Setup UVs for the Character
4950  #region Setup UVs
4951  Vector2 uv0 = new Vector2((float)m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.x / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.width, (float)m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.y / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.height); // bottom left
4952  Vector2 uv1 = new Vector2(uv0.x, (float)(m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.y + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.height) / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.height); // top left
4953  Vector2 uv2 = new Vector2((float)(m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.x + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.glyphRect.width) / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.width, uv1.y); // top right
4954  Vector2 uv3 = new Vector2(uv2.x, uv0.y); // bottom right
4955 
4956  // Store UV Information
4957  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.uv = uv0;
4958  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.uv = uv1;
4959  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.uv = uv2;
4960  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.uv = uv3;
4961  #endregion Setup UVs
4962 
4963 
4964  // Normal
4965  #region Setup Normals & Tangents
4966  //Vector3 normal = new Vector3(0, 0, -1);
4967  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.normal = normal;
4968  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.normal = normal;
4969  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.normal = normal;
4970  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.normal = normal;
4971 
4972  // Tangents
4973  //Vector4 tangent = new Vector4(-1, 0, 0, 1);
4974  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.tangent = tangent;
4975  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.tangent = tangent;
4976  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.tangent = tangent;
4977  //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.tangent = tangent;
4978  #endregion end Normals & Tangents
4979 
4980  }
4981 
4982 
4988  protected virtual void FillCharacterVertexBuffers(int i, int index_X4)
4989  {
4990  int materialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].materialReferenceIndex;
4991  index_X4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount;
4992 
4993  // Make sure buffers allocation are sufficient to hold the vertex data
4994  //if (m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices.Length < index_X4 + 4)
4995  // m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].ResizeMeshInfo(Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(index_X4 + 4));
4996 
4997 
4998  TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfoArray = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
4999  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertexIndex = index_X4;
5000 
5001  // Setup Vertices for Characters
5002  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position;
5003  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position;
5004  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position;
5005  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position;
5006 
5007 
5008  // Setup UVS0
5009  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
5010  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
5011  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
5012  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
5013 
5014 
5015  // Setup UVS2
5016  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
5017  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
5018  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
5019  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
5020 
5021 
5022  // Setup UVS4
5023  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv4;
5024  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv4;
5025  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv4;
5026  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv4;
5027 
5028 
5029  // setup Vertex Colors
5030  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
5031  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
5032  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
5033  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
5034 
5035  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount = index_X4 + 4;
5036  }
5037 
5038 
5039  protected virtual void FillCharacterVertexBuffers(int i, int index_X4, bool isVolumetric)
5040  {
5041  int materialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].materialReferenceIndex;
5042  index_X4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount;
5043 
5044  TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfoArray = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
5045  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertexIndex = index_X4;
5046 
5047  // Setup Vertices for Characters
5048  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position;
5049  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position;
5050  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position;
5051  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position;
5052 
5053  if (isVolumetric)
5054  {
5055  Vector3 depth = new Vector3(0, 0, m_fontSize * m_fontScale);
5056  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[4 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position + depth;
5057  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[5 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position + depth;
5058  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[6 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position + depth;
5059  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[7 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position + depth;
5060  }
5061 
5062  // Setup UVS0
5063  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
5064  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
5065  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
5066  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
5067 
5068  if (isVolumetric)
5069  {
5070  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[4 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
5071  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[5 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
5072  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[6 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
5073  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[7 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
5074  }
5075 
5076 
5077  // Setup UVS2
5078  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
5079  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
5080  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
5081  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
5082 
5083  if (isVolumetric)
5084  {
5085  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[4 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
5086  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[5 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
5087  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[6 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
5088  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[7 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
5089  }
5090 
5091 
5092  // Setup UVS4
5093  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv4;
5094  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv4;
5095  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv4;
5096  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv4;
5097 
5098 
5099  // setup Vertex Colors
5100  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
5101  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
5102  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
5103  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
5104 
5105  if (isVolumetric)
5106  {
5107  Color32 backColor = new Color32(255, 255, 128, 255);
5108  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[4 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
5109  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[5 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
5110  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[6 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
5111  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[7 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
5112  }
5113 
5114  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount = index_X4 + (!isVolumetric ? 4 : 8);
5115  }
5116 
5117 
5123  protected virtual void FillSpriteVertexBuffers(int i, int index_X4)
5124  {
5125  int materialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].materialReferenceIndex;
5126  index_X4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount;
5127 
5128  TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfoArray = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
5129  m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertexIndex = index_X4;
5130 
5131  // Setup Vertices for Characters
5132  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position;
5133  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position;
5134  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position;
5135  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position;
5136 
5137 
5138  // Setup UVS0
5139  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
5140  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
5141  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
5142  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
5143 
5144 
5145  // Setup UVS2
5146  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
5147  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
5148  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
5149  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
5150 
5151 
5152  // Setup UVS4
5153  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv4;
5154  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv4;
5155  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv4;
5156  //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv4;
5157 
5158 
5159  // setup Vertex Colors
5160  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
5161  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
5162  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
5163  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
5164 
5165  m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount = index_X4 + 4;
5166  }
5167 
5168 
5178  protected virtual void DrawUnderlineMesh(Vector3 start, Vector3 end, ref int index, float startScale, float endScale, float maxScale, float sdfScale, Color32 underlineColor)
5179  {
5180  if (m_cached_Underline_Character == null)
5181  {
5182  if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
5183  Debug.LogWarning("Unable to add underline since the Font Asset doesn't contain the underline character.", this);
5184 
5185  return;
5186  }
5187 
5188  int verticesCount = index + 12;
5189  // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
5190  if (verticesCount > m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].vertices.Length)
5191  {
5192  // Resize Mesh Buffers
5193  m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].ResizeMeshInfo(verticesCount / 4);
5194  }
5195 
5196  // Adjust the position of the underline based on the lowest character. This matters for subscript character.
5197  start.y = Mathf.Min(start.y, end.y);
5198  end.y = Mathf.Min(start.y, end.y);
5199 
5200  float segmentWidth = m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.metrics.width / 2 * maxScale;
5201 
5202  if (end.x - start.x < m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.metrics.width * maxScale)
5203  {
5204  segmentWidth = (end.x - start.x) / 2f;
5205  }
5206 
5207  float startPadding = m_padding * startScale / maxScale;
5208  float endPadding = m_padding * endScale / maxScale;
5209 
5210  float underlineThickness = m_fontAsset.faceInfo.underlineThickness;
5211 
5212  // UNDERLINE VERTICES FOR (3) LINE SEGMENTS
5213  #region UNDERLINE VERTICES
5214  Vector3[] vertices = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].vertices;
5215 
5216  // Front Part of the Underline
5217  vertices[index + 0] = start + new Vector3(0, 0 - (underlineThickness + m_padding) * maxScale, 0); // BL
5218  vertices[index + 1] = start + new Vector3(0, m_padding * maxScale, 0); // TL
5219  vertices[index + 2] = vertices[index + 1] + new Vector3(segmentWidth, 0, 0); // TR
5220  vertices[index + 3] = vertices[index + 0] + new Vector3(segmentWidth, 0, 0); // BR
5221 
5222  // Middle Part of the Underline
5223  vertices[index + 4] = vertices[index + 3]; // BL
5224  vertices[index + 5] = vertices[index + 2]; // TL
5225  vertices[index + 6] = end + new Vector3(-segmentWidth, m_padding * maxScale, 0); // TR
5226  vertices[index + 7] = end + new Vector3(-segmentWidth, -(underlineThickness + m_padding) * maxScale, 0); // BR
5227 
5228  // End Part of the Underline
5229  vertices[index + 8] = vertices[index + 7]; // BL
5230  vertices[index + 9] = vertices[index + 6]; // TL
5231  vertices[index + 10] = end + new Vector3(0, m_padding * maxScale, 0); // TR
5232  vertices[index + 11] = end + new Vector3(0, -(underlineThickness + m_padding) * maxScale, 0); // BR
5233  #endregion
5234 
5235  // UNDERLINE UV0
5236  #region HANDLE UV0
5237  Vector2[] uvs0 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs0;
5238 
5239  // Calculate UV required to setup the 3 Quads for the Underline.
5240  Vector2 uv0 = new Vector2((m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.x - startPadding) / m_fontAsset.atlasWidth, (m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.y - m_padding) / m_fontAsset.atlasHeight); // bottom left
5241  Vector2 uv1 = new Vector2(uv0.x, (m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.y + m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.height + m_padding) / m_fontAsset.atlasHeight); // top left
5242  Vector2 uv2 = new Vector2((m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.x - startPadding + (float)m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.width / 2) / m_fontAsset.atlasWidth, uv1.y); // Mid Top Left
5243  Vector2 uv3 = new Vector2(uv2.x, uv0.y); // Mid Bottom Left
5244  Vector2 uv4 = new Vector2((m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.x + endPadding + (float)m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.width / 2) / m_fontAsset.atlasWidth, uv1.y); // Mid Top Right
5245  Vector2 uv5 = new Vector2(uv4.x, uv0.y); // Mid Bottom right
5246  Vector2 uv6 = new Vector2((m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.x + endPadding + m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.width) / m_fontAsset.atlasWidth, uv1.y); // End Part - Bottom Right
5247  Vector2 uv7 = new Vector2(uv6.x, uv0.y); // End Part - Top Right
5248 
5249  // Left Part of the Underline
5250  uvs0[0 + index] = uv0; // BL
5251  uvs0[1 + index] = uv1; // TL
5252  uvs0[2 + index] = uv2; // TR
5253  uvs0[3 + index] = uv3; // BR
5254 
5255  // Middle Part of the Underline
5256  uvs0[4 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x - uv2.x * 0.001f, uv0.y);
5257  uvs0[5 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x - uv2.x * 0.001f, uv1.y);
5258  uvs0[6 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x + uv2.x * 0.001f, uv1.y);
5259  uvs0[7 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x + uv2.x * 0.001f, uv0.y);
5260 
5261  // Right Part of the Underline
5262  uvs0[8 + index] = uv5;
5263  uvs0[9 + index] = uv4;
5264  uvs0[10 + index] = uv6;
5265  uvs0[11 + index] = uv7;
5266  #endregion
5267 
5268  // UNDERLINE UV2
5269  #region HANDLE UV2 - SDF SCALE
5270  // UV1 contains Face / Border UV layout.
5271  float min_UvX = 0;
5272  float max_UvX = (vertices[index + 2].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
5273 
5274  //Calculate the xScale or how much the UV's are getting stretched on the X axis for the middle section of the underline.
5275  float xScale = Mathf.Abs(sdfScale);
5276 
5277  Vector2[] uvs2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs2;
5278 
5279  uvs2[0 + index] = PackUV(0, 0, xScale);
5280  uvs2[1 + index] = PackUV(0, 1, xScale);
5281  uvs2[2 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 1, xScale);
5282  uvs2[3 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 0, xScale);
5283 
5284  min_UvX = (vertices[index + 4].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
5285  max_UvX = (vertices[index + 6].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
5286 
5287  uvs2[4 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 0, xScale);
5288  uvs2[5 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 1, xScale);
5289  uvs2[6 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 1, xScale);
5290  uvs2[7 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 0, xScale);
5291 
5292  min_UvX = (vertices[index + 8].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
5293  max_UvX = (vertices[index + 6].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
5294 
5295  uvs2[8 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 0, xScale);
5296  uvs2[9 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 1, xScale);
5297  uvs2[10 + index] = PackUV(1, 1, xScale);
5298  uvs2[11 + index] = PackUV(1, 0, xScale);
5299  #endregion
5300 
5301  // UNDERLINE VERTEX COLORS
5302  #region
5303  // Alpha is the lower of the vertex color or tag color alpha used.
5304  underlineColor.a = m_fontColor32.a < underlineColor.a ? (byte)(m_fontColor32.a) : (byte)(underlineColor.a);
5305 
5306  Color32[] colors32 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].colors32;
5307  colors32[0 + index] = underlineColor;
5308  colors32[1 + index] = underlineColor;
5309  colors32[2 + index] = underlineColor;
5310  colors32[3 + index] = underlineColor;
5311 
5312  colors32[4 + index] = underlineColor;
5313  colors32[5 + index] = underlineColor;
5314  colors32[6 + index] = underlineColor;
5315  colors32[7 + index] = underlineColor;
5316 
5317  colors32[8 + index] = underlineColor;
5318  colors32[9 + index] = underlineColor;
5319  colors32[10 + index] = underlineColor;
5320  colors32[11 + index] = underlineColor;
5321  #endregion
5322 
5323  index += 12;
5324  }
5325 
5326 
5327  protected virtual void DrawTextHighlight(Vector3 start, Vector3 end, ref int index, Color32 highlightColor)
5328  {
5329  if (m_cached_Underline_Character == null)
5330  {
5331  if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled) Debug.LogWarning("Unable to add underline since the Font Asset doesn't contain the underline character.", this);
5332  return;
5333  }
5334 
5335  int verticesCount = index + 4;
5336  // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
5337  if (verticesCount > m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].vertices.Length)
5338  {
5339  // Resize Mesh Buffers
5340  m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].ResizeMeshInfo(verticesCount / 4);
5341  }
5342 
5343  // UNDERLINE VERTICES FOR (3) LINE SEGMENTS
5344  #region HIGHLIGHT VERTICES
5345  Vector3[] vertices = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].vertices;
5346 
5347  // Front Part of the Underline
5348  vertices[index + 0] = start; // BL
5349  vertices[index + 1] = new Vector3(start.x, end.y, 0); // TL
5350  vertices[index + 2] = end; // TR
5351  vertices[index + 3] = new Vector3(end.x, start.y, 0); // BR
5352  #endregion
5353 
5354  // UNDERLINE UV0
5355  #region HANDLE UV0
5356  Vector2[] uvs0 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs0;
5357 
5358  // Calculate UV required to setup the 3 Quads for the Underline.
5359  Vector2 uv0 = new Vector2(((float)m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.x + m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.width / 2) / m_fontAsset.atlasWidth, (m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.y + (float)m_cached_Underline_Character.glyph.glyphRect.height / 2) / m_fontAsset.atlasHeight); // bottom left
5360  //Vector2 uv1 = new Vector2(uv0.x, uv0.y); // top left
5361  //Vector2 uv2 = new Vector2(uv0.x, uv0.y); // Top Right
5362  //Vector2 uv3 = new Vector2(uv2.x, uv0.y); // Bottom Right
5363 
5364  // Left Part of the Underline
5365  uvs0[0 + index] = uv0; // BL
5366  uvs0[1 + index] = uv0; // TL
5367  uvs0[2 + index] = uv0; // TR
5368  uvs0[3 + index] = uv0; // BR
5369  #endregion
5370 
5371  // UNDERLINE UV2
5372  #region HANDLE UV2 - SDF SCALE
5373  // UV1 contains Face / Border UV layout.
5374  //float min_UvX = 0;
5375  //float max_UvX = (vertices[index + 2].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
5376 
5378  //float xScale = 0; // Mathf.Abs(sdfScale);
5379 
5380  Vector2[] uvs2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs2;
5381  Vector2 customUV = new Vector2(0, 1);
5382  uvs2[0 + index] = customUV; // PackUV(-0.2f, -0.2f, xScale);
5383  uvs2[1 + index] = customUV; // PackUV(-0.2f, -0.1f, xScale);
5384  uvs2[2 + index] = customUV; // PackUV(-0.1f, -0.1f, xScale);
5385  uvs2[3 + index] = customUV; // PackUV(-0.1f, -0.2f, xScale);
5386  #endregion
5387 
5388  // HIGHLIGHT VERTEX COLORS
5389  #region
5390  // Alpha is the lower of the vertex color or tag color alpha used.
5391  highlightColor.a = m_fontColor32.a < highlightColor.a ? m_fontColor32.a : highlightColor.a;
5392 
5393  Color32[] colors32 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].colors32;
5394  colors32[0 + index] = highlightColor;
5395  colors32[1 + index] = highlightColor;
5396  colors32[2 + index] = highlightColor;
5397  colors32[3 + index] = highlightColor;
5398  #endregion
5399 
5400  index += 4;
5401  }
5402 
5403 
5407  protected void LoadDefaultSettings()
5408  {
5409  if (m_text == null || m_isWaitingOnResourceLoad)
5410  {
5411  if (TMP_Settings.autoSizeTextContainer)
5412  autoSizeTextContainer = true;
5413  else
5414  {
5415  m_rectTransform = this.rectTransform;
5416 
5417  if (GetType() == typeof(TextMeshPro))
5418  m_rectTransform.sizeDelta = TMP_Settings.defaultTextMeshProTextContainerSize;
5419  else
5420  m_rectTransform.sizeDelta = TMP_Settings.defaultTextMeshProUITextContainerSize;
5421  }
5422 
5423  m_enableWordWrapping = TMP_Settings.enableWordWrapping;
5424  m_enableKerning = TMP_Settings.enableKerning;
5425  m_enableExtraPadding = TMP_Settings.enableExtraPadding;
5426  m_tintAllSprites = TMP_Settings.enableTintAllSprites;
5427  m_parseCtrlCharacters = TMP_Settings.enableParseEscapeCharacters;
5428  m_fontSize = m_fontSizeBase = TMP_Settings.defaultFontSize;
5429  m_fontSizeMin = m_fontSize * TMP_Settings.defaultTextAutoSizingMinRatio;
5430  m_fontSizeMax = m_fontSize * TMP_Settings.defaultTextAutoSizingMaxRatio;
5431  m_isWaitingOnResourceLoad = false;
5432  raycastTarget = TMP_Settings.enableRaycastTarget;
5433  }
5434  }
5435 
5436 
5441  protected void GetSpecialCharacters(TMP_FontAsset fontAsset)
5442  {
5443  // Check & Assign Underline Character for use with the Underline tag.
5444  if (!fontAsset.characterLookupTable.TryGetValue(95, out m_cached_Underline_Character))
5445  {
5446  m_cached_Underline_Character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(95,fontAsset, false, m_FontStyleInternal, (FontWeight)m_FontWeightInternal, out bool isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out TMP_FontAsset tempFontAsset);
5447 
5448  if (m_cached_Underline_Character == null)
5449  {
5450  if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
5451  Debug.LogWarning("The character used for Underline and Strikethrough is not available in font asset [" + fontAsset.name + "].", this);
5452  }
5453  }
5454 
5455  // Check & Assign Underline Character for use with the Underline tag.
5456  if (!fontAsset.characterLookupTable.TryGetValue(8230, out m_cached_Ellipsis_Character)) //95
5457  {
5458  m_cached_Ellipsis_Character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(8230, fontAsset, false, m_FontStyleInternal, (FontWeight)m_FontWeightInternal, out bool isUsingAlternativeTypeface, out TMP_FontAsset tempFontAsset);
5459 
5460  if (m_cached_Ellipsis_Character == null)
5461  {
5462  if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
5463  Debug.LogWarning("The character used for Ellipsis is not available in font asset [" + fontAsset.name + "].", this);
5464  }
5465  }
5466  }
5467 
5468 
5476  protected void ReplaceTagWithCharacter(int[] chars, int insertionIndex, int tagLength, char c)
5477  {
5478  chars[insertionIndex] = c;
5479 
5480  for (int i = insertionIndex + tagLength; i < chars.Length; i++)
5481  {
5482  chars[i - 3] = chars[i];
5483  }
5484  }

5491  //protected int GetMaterialReferenceForFontWeight()
5492  //{
5493  // //bool isItalic = (m_style & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic || (m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic;
5494 
5495  // m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentFontAsset.fontWeights[0].italicTypeface.material, m_currentFontAsset.fontWeights[0].italicTypeface, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
5496 
5497  // return 0;
5498  //}
5499 
5500 
5505  protected TMP_FontAsset GetFontAssetForWeight(int fontWeight)
5506  {
5507  bool isItalic = (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic || (m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic;
5508 
5509  TMP_FontAsset fontAsset = null;
5510 
5511  int weightIndex = fontWeight / 100;
5512 
5513  if (isItalic)
5514  fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset.fontWeightTable[weightIndex].italicTypeface;
5515  else
5516  fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset.fontWeightTable[weightIndex].regularTypeface;
5517 
5518  return fontAsset;
5519  }
