5521 
5526  protected virtual void SetActiveSubMeshes(bool state) { }
5527 
5528 
5532  protected virtual void ClearSubMeshObjects() { }
5533 
5534 
5538  public virtual void ClearMesh() { }
5539 
5540 
5544  public virtual void ClearMesh(bool uploadGeometry) { }
5545 
5546 
5551  public virtual string GetParsedText()
5552  {
5553  if (m_textInfo == null)
5554  return string.Empty;
5555 
5556  int characterCount = m_textInfo.characterCount;
5557 
5558  // TODO - Could implement some static buffer pool shared by all instances of TMP objects.
5559  char[] buffer = new char[characterCount];
5560 
5561  for (int i = 0; i < characterCount && i < m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length; i++)
5562  {
5563  buffer[i] = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].character;
5564  }
5565 
5566  return new string(buffer);
5567  }
5568 
5569 
5577  //protected Vector2 PackUV(float x, float y, float scale)
5578  //{
5579  // Vector2 output;
5580 
5581  // output.x = Mathf.Floor(x * 4095);
5582  // output.y = Mathf.Floor(y * 4095);
5583 
5584  // output.x = (output.x * 4096) + output.y;
5585  // output.y = scale;
5586 
5587  // return output;
5588  //}
5589 
5597  protected Vector2 PackUV(float x, float y, float scale)
5598  {
5599  Vector2 output;
5600 
5601  output.x = (int)(x * 511);
5602  output.y = (int)(y * 511);
5603 
5604  output.x = (output.x * 4096) + output.y;
5605  output.y = scale;
5606 
5607  return output;
5608  }
5609 
5610 
5617  protected float PackUV(float x, float y)
5618  {
5619  double x0 = (int)(x * 511);
5620  double y0 = (int)(y * 511);
5621 
5622  return (float)((x0 * 4096) + y0);
5623  }
5624 
5625 
5629  internal virtual void InternalUpdate() { }
5630 
5631 
5639  //protected Vector2 PackUV(float x, float y, float scale)
5640  //{
5641  // Vector2 output;
5642 
5643  // output.x = Mathf.Floor(x * 4095);
5644  // output.y = Mathf.Floor(y * 4095);
5645 
5646  // return new Vector2((output.x * 4096) + output.y, scale);
5647  //}
5648 
5649 
5656  //protected float PackUV(float x, float y)
5657  //{
5658  // x = (x % 5) / 5;
5659  // y = (y % 5) / 5;
5660 
5661  // return Mathf.Round(x * 4096) + y;
5662  //}
5663 
5664 
5670  protected int HexToInt(char hex)
5671  {
5672  switch (hex)
5673  {
5674  case '0': return 0;
5675  case '1': return 1;
5676  case '2': return 2;
5677  case '3': return 3;
5678  case '4': return 4;
5679  case '5': return 5;
5680  case '6': return 6;
5681  case '7': return 7;
5682  case '8': return 8;
5683  case '9': return 9;
5684  case 'A': return 10;
5685  case 'B': return 11;
5686  case 'C': return 12;
5687  case 'D': return 13;
5688  case 'E': return 14;
5689  case 'F': return 15;
5690  case 'a': return 10;
5691  case 'b': return 11;
5692  case 'c': return 12;
5693  case 'd': return 13;
5694  case 'e': return 14;
5695  case 'f': return 15;
5696  }
5697  return 15;
5698  }
5699 
5700 
5706  protected int GetUTF16(string text, int i)
5707  {
5708  int unicode = 0;
5709  unicode += HexToInt(text[i]) << 12;
5710  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 1]) << 8;
5711  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 2]) << 4;
5712  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 3]);
5713  return unicode;
5714  }
5715 
5721  protected int GetUTF16(StringBuilder text, int i)
5722  {
5723  int unicode = 0;
5724  unicode += HexToInt(text[i]) << 12;
5725  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 1]) << 8;
5726  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 2]) << 4;
5727  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 3]);
5728  return unicode;
5729  }
5730 
5731 
5737  protected int GetUTF32(string text, int i)
5738  {
5739  int unicode = 0;
5740  unicode += HexToInt(text[i]) << 30;
5741  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 1]) << 24;
5742  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 2]) << 20;
5743  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 3]) << 16;
5744  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 4]) << 12;
5745  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 5]) << 8;
5746  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 6]) << 4;
5747  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 7]);
5748  return unicode;
5749  }
5750 
5756  protected int GetUTF32(StringBuilder text, int i)
5757  {
5758  int unicode = 0;
5759  unicode += HexToInt(text[i]) << 30;
5760  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 1]) << 24;
5761  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 2]) << 20;
5762  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 3]) << 16;
5763  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 4]) << 12;
5764  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 5]) << 8;
5765  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 6]) << 4;
5766  unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 7]);
5767  return unicode;
5768  }
5769 
5770 
5777  protected Color32 HexCharsToColor(char[] hexChars, int tagCount)
5778  {
5779  if (tagCount == 4)
5780  {
5781  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[1]));
5782  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[2]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
5783  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[3]));
5784 
5785  return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
5786  }
5787  else if (tagCount == 5)
5788  {
5789  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[1]));
5790  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[2]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
5791  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[3]));
5792  byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[4]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[4]));
5793 
5794  return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
5795  }
5796  else if (tagCount == 7)
5797  {
5798  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
5799  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[4]));
5800  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[6]));
5801 
5802  return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
5803  }
5804  else if (tagCount == 9)
5805  {
5806  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
5807  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[4]));
5808  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[6]));
5809  byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
5810 
5811  return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
5812  }
5813  else if (tagCount == 10)
5814  {
5815  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[7]));
5816  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[8]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
5817  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[9]));
5818 
5819  return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
5820  }
5821  else if (tagCount == 11)
5822  {
5823  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[7]));
5824  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[8]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
5825  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[9]));
5826  byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[10]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[10]));
5827 
5828  return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
5829  }
5830  else if (tagCount == 13)
5831  {
5832  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
5833  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[10]));
5834  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[11]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[12]));
5835 
5836  return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
5837  }
5838  else if (tagCount == 15)
5839  {
5840  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
5841  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[10]));
5842  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[11]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[12]));
5843  byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[13]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[14]));
5844 
5845  return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
5846  }
5847 
5848  return new Color32(255, 255, 255, 255);
5849  }
5850 
5851 
5859  protected Color32 HexCharsToColor(char[] hexChars, int startIndex, int length)
5860  {
5861  if (length == 7)
5862  {
5863  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 2]));
5864  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 4]));
5865  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 6]));
5866 
5867  return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
5868  }
5869  else if (length == 9)
5870  {
5871  byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 2]));
5872  byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 4]));
5873  byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 6]));
5874  byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 8]));
5875 
5876  return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
5877  }
5878 
5879  return s_colorWhite;
5880  }
5881 
5882 
5891  int GetAttributeParameters(char[] chars, int startIndex, int length, ref float[] parameters)
5892  {
5893  int endIndex = startIndex;
5894  int attributeCount = 0;
5895 
5896  while (endIndex < startIndex + length)
5897  {
5898  parameters[attributeCount] = ConvertToFloat(chars, startIndex, length, out endIndex);
5899 
5900  length -= (endIndex - startIndex) + 1;
5901  startIndex = endIndex + 1;
5902 
5903  attributeCount += 1;
5904  }
5905 
5906  return attributeCount;
5907  }
5908 
5909 
5917  protected float ConvertToFloat(char[] chars, int startIndex, int length)
5918  {
5919  return ConvertToFloat(chars, startIndex, length, out int lastIndex);
5920  }
5921 
5922 
5931  protected float ConvertToFloat(char[] chars, int startIndex, int length, out int lastIndex)
5932  {
5933  if (startIndex == 0) { lastIndex = 0; return -9999; }
5934  int endIndex = startIndex + length;
5935 
5936  bool isIntegerValue = true;
5937  float decimalPointMultiplier = 0;
5938 
5939  // Set value multiplier checking the first character to determine if we are using '+' or '-'
5940  int valueSignMultiplier = 1;
5941  if (chars[startIndex] == '+')
5942  {
5943  valueSignMultiplier = 1;
5944  startIndex += 1;
5945  }
5946  else if (chars[startIndex] == '-')
5947  {
5948  valueSignMultiplier = -1;
5949  startIndex += 1;
5950  }
5951 
5952  float value = 0;
5953 
5954  for (int i = startIndex; i < endIndex; i++)
5955  {
5956  uint c = chars[i];
5957 
5958  if (c >= '0' && c <= '9' || c == '.')
5959  {
5960  if (c == '.')
5961  {
5962  isIntegerValue = false;
5963  decimalPointMultiplier = 0.1f;
5964  continue;
5965  }
5966 
5967  //Calculate integer and floating point value
5968  if (isIntegerValue)
5969  value = value * 10 + (c - 48) * valueSignMultiplier;
5970  else
5971  {
5972  value = value + (c - 48) * decimalPointMultiplier * valueSignMultiplier;
5973  decimalPointMultiplier *= 0.1f;
5974  }
5975 
5976  continue;
5977  }
5978  else if (c == ',')
5979  {
5980  if (i + 1 < endIndex && chars[i + 1] == ' ')
5981  lastIndex = i + 1;
5982  else
5983  lastIndex = i;
5984 
5985  return value;
5986  }
5987  }
5988 
5989  lastIndex = endIndex;
5990  return value;
5991  }
5992 
5993 
6001  protected bool ValidateHtmlTag(UnicodeChar[] chars, int startIndex, out int endIndex)
6002  {
6003  int tagCharCount = 0;
6004  byte attributeFlag = 0;
6005 
6006  int attributeIndex = 0;
6007  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
6008  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
6009  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
6010  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
6011  TagValueType tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
6012  TagUnitType tagUnitType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6013 
6014  // Clear attribute name hash codes
6015  m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode = 0;
6016  m_xmlAttribute[2].nameHashCode = 0;
6017  m_xmlAttribute[3].nameHashCode = 0;
6018  m_xmlAttribute[4].nameHashCode = 0;
6019 
6020  endIndex = startIndex;
6021  bool isTagSet = false;
6022  bool isValidHtmlTag = false;
6023 
6024  for (int i = startIndex; i < chars.Length && chars[i].unicode != 0 && tagCharCount < m_htmlTag.Length && chars[i].unicode != '<'; i++)
6025  {
6026  int unicode = chars[i].unicode;
6027 
6028  if (unicode == '>') // ASCII Code of End HTML tag '>'
6029  {
6030  isValidHtmlTag = true;
6031  endIndex = i;
6032  m_htmlTag[tagCharCount] = (char)0;
6033  break;
6034  }
6035 
6036  m_htmlTag[tagCharCount] = (char)unicode;
6037  tagCharCount += 1;
6038 
6039  if (attributeFlag == 1)
6040  {
6041  if (tagValueType == TagValueType.None)
6042  {
6043  // Check for attribute type
6044  if (unicode == '+' || unicode == '-' || unicode == '.' || (unicode >= '0' && unicode <= '9'))
6045  {
6046  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6047  tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.NumericalValue;
6048  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount - 1;
6049  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
6050  }
6051  else if (unicode == '#')
6052  {
6053  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6054  tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.ColorValue;
6055  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount - 1;
6056  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
6057  }
6058  else if (unicode == '"')
6059  {
6060  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6061  tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.StringValue;
6062  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount;
6063  }
6064  else
6065  {
6066  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6067  tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.StringValue;
6068  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount - 1;
6069  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = (m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode << 5) + m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode ^ unicode;
6070  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
6071  }
6072  }
6073  else
6074  {
6075  if (tagValueType == TagValueType.NumericalValue)
6076  {
6077  // Check for termination of numerical value.
6078  if (unicode == 'p' || unicode == 'e' || unicode == '%' || unicode == ' ')
6079  {
6080  attributeFlag = 2;
6081  tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
6082 
6083  switch (unicode)
6084  {
6085  case 'e':
6086  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = tagUnitType = TagUnitType.FontUnits;
6087  break;
6088  case '%':
6089  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Percentage;
6090  break;
6091  default:
6092  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6093  break;
6094  }
6095 
6096  attributeIndex += 1;
6097  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
6098  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
6099  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
6100  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6101  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
6102  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
6103 
6104  }
6105  else if (attributeFlag != 2)
6106  {
6107  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
6108  }
6109  }
6110  else if (tagValueType == TagValueType.ColorValue)
6111  {
6112  if (unicode != ' ')
6113  {
6114  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
6115  }
6116  else
6117  {
6118  attributeFlag = 2;
6119  tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
6120  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6121  attributeIndex += 1;
6122  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
6123  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
6124  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6125  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
6126  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
6127  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
6128  }
6129  }
6130  else if (tagValueType == TagValueType.StringValue)
6131  {
6132  // Compute HashCode value for the named tag.
6133  if (unicode != '"')
6134  {
6135  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = (m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode << 5) + m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode ^ unicode;
6136  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
6137  }
6138  else
6139  {
6140  attributeFlag = 2;
6141  tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
6142  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6143  attributeIndex += 1;
6144  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
6145  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
6146  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6147  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
6148  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
6149  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
6150  }
6151  }
6152  }
6153  }
6154 
6155 
6156  if (unicode == '=') // '='
6157  attributeFlag = 1;
6158 
6159  // Compute HashCode for the name of the attribute
6160  if (attributeFlag == 0 && unicode == ' ')
6161  {
6162  if (isTagSet) return false;
6163 
6164  isTagSet = true;
6165  attributeFlag = 2;
6166 
6167  tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
6168  tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6169  attributeIndex += 1;
6170  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
6171  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
6172  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
6173  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
6174  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
6175  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
6176  }
6177 
6178  if (attributeFlag == 0)
6179  m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = (m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode << 3) - m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode + unicode;
6180 
6181  if (attributeFlag == 2 && unicode == ' ')
6182  attributeFlag = 0;
6183 
6184  }
6185 
6186  if (!isValidHtmlTag)
6187  {
6188  return false;
6189  }
6190 
6191  //Debug.Log("Tag is [" + m_htmlTag.ArrayToString() + "]. Tag HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode + " Tag Value HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode + " Attribute 1 HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode + " Value HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[1].valueHashCode);
6192  //for (int i = 0; i < attributeIndex; i++)
6193  // Debug.Log("Tag [" + i + "] with HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode + " has value of [" + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength) + "] Numerical Value: " + ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength));
6194 
6195  #region Rich Text Tag Processing
6196  #if !RICH_TEXT_ENABLED
6197  // Special handling of the no parsing tag </noparse> </NOPARSE> tag
6198  if (tag_NoParsing && (m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode != 53822163 && m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode != 49429939))
6199  return false;
6200  else if (m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode == 53822163 || m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode == 49429939)
6201  {
6202  tag_NoParsing = false;
6203  return true;
6204  }
6205 
6206  // Color <#FFF> 3 Hex values (short form)
6207  if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 4)
6208  {
6209  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6210  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6211  return true;
6212  }
6213  // Color <#FFF7> 4 Hex values with alpha (short form)
6214  else if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 5)
6215  {
6216  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6217  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6218  return true;
6219  }
6220  // Color <#FF00FF>
6221  else if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 7) // if Tag begins with # and contains 7 characters.
6222  {
6223  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6224  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6225  return true;
6226  }
6227  // Color <#FF00FF00> with alpha
6228  else if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 9) // if Tag begins with # and contains 9 characters.
6229  {
6230  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6231  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6232  return true;
6233  }
6234  else
6235  {
6236  float value = 0;
6237 
6238  switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode)
6239  {
6240  case 98: // <b>
6241  case 66: // <B>
6242  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Bold;
6243  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Bold);
6244 
6245  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Bold;
6246  return true;
6247  case 427: // </b>
6248  case 395: // </B>
6249  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Bold) != FontStyles.Bold)
6250  {
6251  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Bold) == 0)
6252  {
6253  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Bold;
6254  m_FontWeightInternal = m_FontWeightStack.Peek();
6255  }
6256  }
6257  return true;
6258  case 105: // <i>
6259  case 73: // <I>
6260  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Italic;
6261  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Italic);
6262  return true;
6263  case 434: // </i>
6264  case 402: // </I>
6265  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Italic) != FontStyles.Italic)
6266  {
6267  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Italic) == 0)
6268  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Italic;
6269  }
6270  return true;
6271  case 115: // <s>
6272  case 83: // <S>
6273  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Strikethrough;
6274  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Strikethrough);
6275 
6276  if (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 281955 || m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 192323)
6277  {
6278  m_strikethroughColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
6279  m_strikethroughColor.a = m_htmlColor.a < m_strikethroughColor.a ? (byte)(m_htmlColor.a) : (byte)(m_strikethroughColor .a);
6280  }
6281  else
6282  m_strikethroughColor = m_htmlColor;
6283 
6284  m_strikethroughColorStack.Add(m_strikethroughColor);
6285 
6286  return true;
6287  case 444: // </s>
6288  case 412: // </S>
6289  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Strikethrough) != FontStyles.Strikethrough)
6290  {
6291  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Strikethrough) == 0)
6292  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Strikethrough;
6293  }
6294  return true;
6295  case 117: // <u>
6296  case 85: // <U>
6297  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Underline;
6298  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Underline);
6299 
6300  if (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 281955 || m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 192323)
6301  {
6302  m_underlineColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
6303  m_underlineColor.a = m_htmlColor.a < m_underlineColor.a ? (byte)(m_htmlColor.a) : (byte)(m_underlineColor.a);
6304  }
6305  else
6306  m_underlineColor = m_htmlColor;
6307 
6308  m_underlineColorStack.Add(m_underlineColor);
6309 
6310  return true;
6311  case 446: // </u>
6312  case 414: // </U>
6313  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Underline) != FontStyles.Underline)
6314  {
6315  m_underlineColor = m_underlineColorStack.Remove();
6316 
6317  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Underline) == 0)
6318  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Underline;
6319  }
6320  return true;
6321  case 43045: // <mark=#FF00FF80>
6322  case 30245: // <MARK>
6323  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Highlight;
6324  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Highlight);
6325 
6326  m_highlightColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6327  m_highlightColor.a = m_htmlColor.a < m_highlightColor.a ? (byte)(m_htmlColor.a) : (byte)(m_highlightColor.a);
6328  m_highlightColorStack.Add(m_highlightColor);
6329 
6330  // Handle Mark Tag Attributes
6331  for (int i = 0; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
6332  {
6333  int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
6334 
6335  switch (nameHashCode)
6336  {
6337  case 281955: // color
6338  break;
6339 
6340  case 15087385: // padding
6341  int paramCount = GetAttributeParameters(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength, ref m_attributeParameterValues);
6342  if (paramCount != 4) return false;
6343 
6344  m_highlightPadding = new Vector4(m_attributeParameterValues[0], m_attributeParameterValues[1], m_attributeParameterValues[2], m_attributeParameterValues[3]);
6345  break;
6346  }
6347  }
6348 
6349  return true;
6350  case 155892: // </mark>
6351  case 143092: // </MARK>
6352  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Highlight) != FontStyles.Highlight)
6353  {
6354  m_highlightColor = m_highlightColorStack.Remove();
6355 
6356  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Highlight) == 0)
6357  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Highlight;
6358  }
6359  return true;
6360  case 6552: // <sub>
6361  case 4728: // <SUB>
6362  m_fontScaleMultiplier *= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize : 1;
6363  m_baselineOffsetStack.Push(m_baselineOffset);
6364  m_baselineOffset += m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
6365 
6366  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Subscript);
6367  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Subscript;
6368  return true;
6369  case 22673: // </sub>
6370  case 20849: // </SUB>
6371  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Subscript) == FontStyles.Subscript)
6372  {
6373  if (m_fontScaleMultiplier < 1)
6374  {
6375  //m_baselineOffset -= m_currentFontAsset.fontInfo.SubscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
6376  m_baselineOffset = m_baselineOffsetStack.Pop();
6377  m_fontScaleMultiplier /= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize : 1;
6378  }
6379 
6380  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Subscript) == 0)
6381  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Subscript;
6382  }
6383  return true;
6384  case 6566: // <sup>
6385  case 4742: // <SUP>
6386  m_fontScaleMultiplier *= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize : 1;
6387  m_baselineOffsetStack.Push(m_baselineOffset);
6388  m_baselineOffset += m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
6389 
6390  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Superscript);
6391  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Superscript;
6392  return true;
6393  case 22687: // </sup>
6394  case 20863: // </SUP>
6395  if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Superscript) == FontStyles.Superscript)
6396  {
6397  if (m_fontScaleMultiplier < 1)
6398  {
6399  //m_baselineOffset -= m_currentFontAsset.fontInfo.SuperscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
6400  m_baselineOffset = m_baselineOffsetStack.Pop();
6401  m_fontScaleMultiplier /= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize : 1;
6402  }
6403 
6404  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Superscript) == 0)
6405  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Superscript;
6406  }
6407  return true;
6408  case -330774850: // <font-weight>
6409  case 2012149182: // <FONT-WEIGHT>
6410  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6411 
6412  //if (value == -9999) return false;
6413 
6414  //if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold)
6415  //{
6416  // // Nothing happens since Bold is forced on the text.
6417  // //m_fontWeight = 700;
6418  // return true;
6419  //}
6420 
6421 
6423  //m_style &= ~FontStyles.Bold;
6424 
6425  switch ((int)value)
6426  {
6427  case 100:
6428  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Thin;
6429  break;
6430  case 200:
6431  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.ExtraLight;
6432  break;
6433  case 300:
6434  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Light;
6435  break;
6436  case 400:
6437  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Regular;
6438  break;
6439  case 500:
6440  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Medium;
6441  break;
6442  case 600:
6443  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.SemiBold;
6444  break;
6445  case 700:
6446  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Bold;
6447  break;
6448  case 800:
6449  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Heavy;
6450  break;
6451  case 900:
6452  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Black;
6453  break;
6454  }
6455 
6456  m_FontWeightStack.Add(m_FontWeightInternal);
6457 
6458  return true;
6459  case -1885698441: // </font-weight>
6460  case 457225591: // </FONT-WEIGHT>
6461  m_FontWeightStack.Remove();
6462 
6463  if (m_FontStyleInternal == FontStyles.Bold)
6464  m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Bold;
6465  else
6466  m_FontWeightInternal = m_FontWeightStack.Peek();
6467 
6468  return true;
6469  case 6380: // <pos=000.00px> <pos=0em> <pos=50%>
6470  case 4556: // <POS>
6471  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6472  if (value == -9999) return false;
6473 
6474  switch (tagUnitType)
6475  {
6476  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
6477  m_xAdvance = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1.0f : 0.1f);
6478  //m_isIgnoringAlignment = true;
6479  return true;
6480  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
6481  m_xAdvance = value * m_currentFontSize * (m_isOrthographic ? 1.0f : 0.1f);
6482  //m_isIgnoringAlignment = true;
6483  return true;
6484  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
6485  m_xAdvance = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
6486  //m_isIgnoringAlignment = true;
6487  return true;
6488  }
6489  return false;
6490  case 22501: // </pos>
6491  case 20677: // </POS>
6492  m_isIgnoringAlignment = false;
6493  return true;
6494  case 16034505: // <voffset>
6495  case 11642281: // <VOFFSET>
6496  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6497  if (value == -9999) return false;
6498 
6499  switch (tagUnitType)
6500  {
6501  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
6502  m_baselineOffset = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
6503  return true;
6504  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
6505  m_baselineOffset = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
6506  return true;
6507  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
6508  //m_baselineOffset = m_marginHeight * val / 100;
6509  return false;
6510  }
6511  return false;
6512  case 54741026: // </voffset>
6513  case 50348802: // </VOFFSET>
6514  m_baselineOffset = 0;
6515  return true;
6516  case 43991: // <page>
6517  case 31191: // <PAGE>
6518  // This tag only works when Overflow - Page mode is used.
6519  if (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page)
6520  {
6521  m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_LineIndent + tag_Indent;
6522  m_lineOffset = 0;
6523  m_pageNumber += 1;
6524  m_isNewPage = true;
6525  }
6526  return true;
6527  // <BR> tag is now handled inline where it is replaced by a linefeed or \n.
6528  //case 544: // <BR>
6529  //case 800: // <br>
6530  // m_forceLineBreak = true;
6531  // return true;
6532  case 43969: // <nobr>
6533  case 31169: // <NOBR>
6534  m_isNonBreakingSpace = true;
6535  return true;
6536  case 156816: // </nobr>
6537  case 144016: // </NOBR>
6538  m_isNonBreakingSpace = false;
6539  return true;
6540  case 45545: // <size=>
6541  case 32745: // <SIZE>
6542  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6543  if (value == -9999) return false;
6544 
6545  switch (tagUnitType)
6546  {
6547  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
6548  if (m_htmlTag[5] == 43) // <size=+00>
6549  {
6550  m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize + value;
6551  m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
6552  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6553  return true;
6554  }
6555  else if (m_htmlTag[5] == 45) // <size=-00>
6556  {
6557  m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize + value;
6558  m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
6559  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6560  return true;
6561  }
6562  else // <size=00.0>
6563  {
6564  m_currentFontSize = value;
6565  m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
6566  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6567  return true;
6568  }
6569  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
6570  m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize * value;
6571  m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
6572  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6573  return true;
6574  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
6575  m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize * value / 100;
6576  m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
6577  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6578  return true;
6579  }
6580  return false;
6581  case 158392: // </size>
6582  case 145592: // </SIZE>
6583  m_currentFontSize = m_sizeStack.Remove();
6584  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6585  return true;
6586  case 41311: // <font=xx>
6587  case 28511: // <FONT>
6588  int fontHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
6589  int materialAttributeHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode;
6590  int materialHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[1].valueHashCode;
6591 
6592  // Special handling for <font=default> or <font=Default>
6593  if (fontHashCode == 764638571 || fontHashCode == 523367755)
6594  {
6595  m_currentFontAsset = m_materialReferences[0].fontAsset;
6596  m_currentMaterial = m_materialReferences[0].material;
6597  m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
6598  //Debug.Log("<font=Default> assigning Font Asset [" + m_currentFontAsset.name + "] with Material [" + m_currentMaterial.name + "].");
6599 
6600  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6601 
6602  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[0]);
6603 
6604  return true;
6605  }
6606 
6607  TMP_FontAsset tempFont;
6608  Material tempMaterial;
6609 
6610  // HANDLE NEW FONT ASSET
6611  if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetFontAsset(fontHashCode, out tempFont))
6612  {
6613  //if (tempFont != m_currentFontAsset)
6614  //{
6615  // //Debug.Log("Assigning Font Asset: " + tempFont.name);
6616  // m_currentFontAsset = tempFont;
6617  // m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.fontInfo.PointSize * m_currentFontAsset.fontInfo.Scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6618  //}
6619  }
6620  else
6621  {
6622  // Load Font Asset
6623  tempFont = Resources.Load<TMP_FontAsset>(TMP_Settings.defaultFontAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
6624 
6625  if (tempFont == null)
6626  return false;
6627 
6628  // Add new reference to the font asset as well as default material to the MaterialReferenceManager
6629  MaterialReferenceManager.AddFontAsset(tempFont);
6630  }
6631 
6632 
6633  // HANDLE NEW MATERIAL
6634  if (materialAttributeHashCode == 0 && materialHashCode == 0)
6635  {
6636  // No material specified then use default font asset material.
6637  m_currentMaterial = tempFont.material;
6638 
6639  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, tempFont, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
6640 
6641  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
6642  }
6643  else if (materialAttributeHashCode == 103415287 || materialAttributeHashCode == 72669687) // using material attribute
6644  {
6645  if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetMaterial(materialHashCode, out tempMaterial))
6646  {
6647  m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
6648 
6649  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, tempFont, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
6650 
6651  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
6652  }
6653  else
6654  {
6655  // Load new material
6656  tempMaterial = Resources.Load<Material>(TMP_Settings.defaultFontAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength));
6657 
6658  if (tempMaterial == null)
6659  return false;
6660 
6661  // Add new reference to this material in the MaterialReferenceManager
6662  MaterialReferenceManager.AddFontMaterial(materialHashCode, tempMaterial);
6663 
6664  m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
6665 
6666  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, tempFont, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
6667 
6668  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
6669  }
6670  }
6671  else
6672  return false;
6673 
6674  m_currentFontAsset = tempFont;
6675  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6676 
6677  return true;
6678  case 154158: // </font>
6679  case 141358: // </FONT>
6680  {
6681  MaterialReference materialReference = m_materialReferenceStack.Remove();
6682 
6683  m_currentFontAsset = materialReference.fontAsset;
6684  m_currentMaterial = materialReference.material;
6685  m_currentMaterialIndex = materialReference.index;
6686 
6687  m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
6688 
6689  return true;
6690  }
6691  case 103415287: // <material="material name">
6692  case 72669687: // <MATERIAL>
6693  materialHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
6694 
6695  // Special handling for <material=default> or <material=Default>
6696  if (materialHashCode == 764638571 || materialHashCode == 523367755)
6697  {
6698  // Check if material font atlas texture matches that of the current font asset.
6699  //if (m_currentFontAsset.atlas.GetInstanceID() != m_currentMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID()) return false;
6700 
6701  m_currentMaterial = m_materialReferences[0].material;
6702  m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
6703 
6704  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[0]);
6705 
6706  return true;
6707  }
6708 
6709 
6710  // Check if material
6711  if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetMaterial(materialHashCode, out tempMaterial))
6712  {
6713  // Check if material font atlas texture matches that of the current font asset.
6714  //if (m_currentFontAsset.atlas.GetInstanceID() != tempMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID()) return false;
6715 
6716  m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
6717 
6718  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
6719 
6720  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
6721  }
6722  else
6723  {
6724  // Load new material
6725  tempMaterial = Resources.Load<Material>(TMP_Settings.defaultFontAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
6726 
6727  if (tempMaterial == null)
6728  return false;
6729 
6730  // Check if material font atlas texture matches that of the current font asset.
6731  //if (m_currentFontAsset.atlas.GetInstanceID() != tempMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID()) return false;
6732 
6733  // Add new reference to this material in the MaterialReferenceManager
6734  MaterialReferenceManager.AddFontMaterial(materialHashCode, tempMaterial);
6735 
6736  m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
6737 
6738  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset , m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
6739 
6740  m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
6741  }
6742  return true;
6743  case 374360934: // </material>
6744  case 343615334: // </MATERIAL>
6745  {
6746  //if (m_currentMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID() != m_materialReferenceStack.PreviousItem().material.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
6747  // return false;
6748 
6749  MaterialReference materialReference = m_materialReferenceStack.Remove();
6750 
6751  m_currentMaterial = materialReference.material;
6752  m_currentMaterialIndex = materialReference.index;
6753 
6754  return true;
6755  }
6756  case 320078: // <space=000.00>
6757  case 230446: // <SPACE>
6758  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6759  if (value == -9999) return false;
6760 
6761  switch (tagUnitType)
6762  {
6763  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
6764  m_xAdvance += value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
6765  return true;
6766  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
6767  m_xAdvance += value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
6768  return true;
6769  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
6770  // Not applicable
6771  return false;
6772  }
6773  return false;
6774  case 276254: // <alpha=#FF>
6775  case 186622: // <ALPHA>
6776  if (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength != 3) return false;
6777 
6778  m_htmlColor.a = (byte)(HexToInt(m_htmlTag[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(m_htmlTag[8]));
6779  return true;
6780 
6781  case 1750458: // <a name=" ">
6782  return false;
6783  case 426: // </a>
6784  return true;
6785  case 43066: // <link="name">
6786  case 30266: // <LINK>
6787  if (m_isParsingText && !m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
6788  {
6789  int index = m_textInfo.linkCount;
6790 
6791  if (index + 1 > m_textInfo.linkInfo.Length)
6792  TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.linkInfo, index + 1);
6793 
6794  m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].textComponent = this;
6795  m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].hashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
6796  m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].linkTextfirstCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
6797 
6798  m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].linkIdFirstCharacterIndex = startIndex + m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex;
6799  m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].linkIdLength = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength;
6800  m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].SetLinkID(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6801  }
6802  return true;
6803  case 155913: // </link>
6804  case 143113: // </LINK>
6805  if (m_isParsingText && !m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
6806  {
6807  if (m_textInfo.linkCount < m_textInfo.linkInfo.Length)
6808  {
6809  m_textInfo.linkInfo[m_textInfo.linkCount].linkTextLength = m_characterCount - m_textInfo.linkInfo[m_textInfo.linkCount].linkTextfirstCharacterIndex;
6810 
6811  m_textInfo.linkCount += 1;
6812  }
6813  }
6814  return true;
6815  case 275917: // <align=>
6816  case 186285: // <ALIGN>
6817  switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode)
6818  {
6819  case 3774683: // <align=left>
6820  m_lineJustification = TextAlignmentOptions.Left;
6821  m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
6822  return true;
6823  case 136703040: // <align=right>
6824  m_lineJustification = TextAlignmentOptions.Right;
6825  m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
6826  return true;
6827  case -458210101: // <align=center>
6828  m_lineJustification = TextAlignmentOptions.Center;
6829  m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
6830  return true;
6831  case -523808257: // <align=justified>
6832  m_lineJustification = TextAlignmentOptions.Justified;
6833  m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
6834  return true;
6835  case 122383428: // <align=flush>
6836  m_lineJustification = TextAlignmentOptions.Flush;
6837  m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
6838  return true;
6839  }
6840  return false;
6841  case 1065846: // </align>
6842  case 976214: // </ALIGN>
6843  m_lineJustification = m_lineJustificationStack.Remove();
6844  return true;
6845  case 327550: // <width=xx>
6846  case 237918: // <WIDTH>
6847  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
6848  if (value == -9999) return false;
6849 
6850  switch (tagUnitType)
6851  {
6852  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
6853  m_width = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
6854  break;
6855  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
6856  return false;
6857  //break;
6858  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
6859  m_width = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
6860  break;
6861  }
6862  return true;
6863  case 1117479: // </width>
6864  case 1027847: // </WIDTH>
6865  m_width = -1;
6866  return true;
6867  // STYLE tag is now handled inline and replaced by its definition.
6868  //case 322689: // <style="name">
6869  //case 233057: // <STYLE>
6870  // TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode);
6871 
6872  // if (style == null) return false;
6873 
6874  // m_styleStack.Add(style.hashCode);
6875 
6876  // // Parse Style Macro
6877  // for (int i = 0; i < style.styleOpeningTagArray.Length; i++)
6878  // {
6879  // if (style.styleOpeningTagArray[i] == 60)
6880  // {
6881  // if (ValidateHtmlTag(style.styleOpeningTagArray, i + 1, out i) == false) return false;
6882  // }
6883  // }
6884  // return true;
6885  //case 1112618: // </style>
6886  //case 1022986: // </STYLE>
6887  // style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode);
6888 
6889  // if (style == null)
6890  // {
6891  // // Get style from the Style Stack
6892  // int styleHashCode = m_styleStack.CurrentItem();
6893  // style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(styleHashCode);
6894 
6895  // m_styleStack.Remove();
6896  // }
6897 
6898  // if (style == null) return false;
6899  // //// Parse Style Macro
6900  // for (int i = 0; i < style.styleClosingTagArray.Length; i++)
6901  // {
6902  // if (style.styleClosingTagArray[i] == 60)
6903  // ValidateHtmlTag(style.styleClosingTagArray, i + 1, out i);
6904  // }
6905  // return true;
6906  case 281955: // <color> <color=#FF00FF> or <color=#FF00FF00>
6907  case 192323: // <COLOR=#FF00FF>
6908  // <color=#FFF> 3 Hex (short hand)
6909  if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 10)
6910  {
6911  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6912  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6913  return true;
6914  }
6915  // <color=#FFF7> 4 Hex (short hand)
6916  else if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 11)
6917  {
6918  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6919  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6920  return true;
6921  }
6922  // <color=#FF00FF> 3 Hex pairs
6923  if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 13)
6924  {
6925  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6926  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6927  return true;
6928  }
6929  // <color=#FF00FF00> 4 Hex pairs
6930  else if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 15)
6931  {
6932  m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
6933  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6934  return true;
6935  }
6936 
6937  // <color=name>
6938  switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode)
6939  {
6940  case 125395: // <color=red>
6941  m_htmlColor = Color.red;
6942  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6943  return true;
6944  case 3573310: // <color=blue>
6945  m_htmlColor = Color.blue;
6946  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6947  return true;
6948  case 117905991: // <color=black>
6949  m_htmlColor = Color.black;
6950  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6951  return true;
6952  case 121463835: // <color=green>
6953  m_htmlColor = Color.green;
6954  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6955  return true;
6956  case 140357351: // <color=white>
6957  m_htmlColor = Color.white;
6958  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6959  return true;
6960  case 26556144: // <color=orange>
6961  m_htmlColor = new Color32(255, 128, 0, 255);
6962  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6963  return true;
6964  case -36881330: // <color=purple>
6965  m_htmlColor = new Color32(160, 32, 240, 255);
6966  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6967  return true;
6968  case 554054276: // <color=yellow>
6969  m_htmlColor = Color.yellow;
6970  m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
6971  return true;
6972  }
6973  return false;
6974 
6975  case 100149144: //<gradient>
6976  case 69403544: // <GRADIENT>
6977  int gradientPresetHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
6978  TMP_ColorGradient tempColorGradientPreset;
6979 
6980  // Check if Color Gradient Preset has already been loaded.
6981  if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetColorGradientPreset(gradientPresetHashCode, out tempColorGradientPreset))
6982  {
6983  m_colorGradientPreset = tempColorGradientPreset;
6984  }
6985  else
6986  {
6987  // Load Color Gradient Preset
6988  if (tempColorGradientPreset == null)
6989  {
6990  tempColorGradientPreset = Resources.Load<TMP_ColorGradient>(TMP_Settings.defaultColorGradientPresetsPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
6991  }
6992 
6993  if (tempColorGradientPreset == null)
6994  return false;
6995 
6996  MaterialReferenceManager.AddColorGradientPreset(gradientPresetHashCode, tempColorGradientPreset);
6997  m_colorGradientPreset = tempColorGradientPreset;
6998  }
6999 
7000  m_colorGradientStack.Add(m_colorGradientPreset);
7001 
7002  // TODO : Add support for defining preset in the tag itself
7003 
7004  return true;
7005 
7006  case 371094791: // </gradient>
7007  case 340349191: // </GRADIENT>
7008  m_colorGradientPreset = m_colorGradientStack.Remove();
7009  return true;
7010 
7011  case 1983971: // <cspace=xx.x>
7012  case 1356515: // <CSPACE>
7013  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7014  if (value == -9999) return false;
7015 
7016  switch (tagUnitType)
7017  {
7018  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7019  m_cSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7020  break;
7021  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7022  m_cSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7023  break;
7024  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7025  return false;
7026  }
7027  return true;
7028  case 7513474: // </cspace>
7029  case 6886018: // </CSPACE>
7030  if (!m_isParsingText) return true;
7031 
7032  // Adjust xAdvance to remove extra space from last character.
7033  if (m_characterCount > 0)
7034  {
7035  m_xAdvance -= m_cSpacing;
7036  m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].xAdvance = m_xAdvance;
7037  }
7038  m_cSpacing = 0;
7039  return true;
7040  case 2152041: // <mspace=xx.x>
7041  case 1524585: // <MSPACE>
7042  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7043  if (value == -9999) return false;
7044 
7045  switch (tagUnitType)
7046  {
7047  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7048  m_monoSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7049  break;
7050  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7051  m_monoSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7052  break;
7053  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7054  return false;
7055  }
7056  return true;
7057  case 7681544: // </mspace>
7058  case 7054088: // </MSPACE>
7059  m_monoSpacing = 0;
7060  return true;
7061  case 280416: // <class="name">
7062  return false;
7063  case 1071884: // </color>
7064  case 982252: // </COLOR>
7065  m_htmlColor = m_colorStack.Remove();
7066  return true;
7067  case 2068980: // <indent=10px> <indent=10em> <indent=50%>
7068  case 1441524: // <INDENT>
7069  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7070  if (value == -9999) return false;
7071 
7072  switch (tagUnitType)
7073  {
7074  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7075  tag_Indent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7076  break;
7077  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7078  tag_Indent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7079  break;
7080  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7081  tag_Indent = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
7082  break;
7083  }
7084  m_indentStack.Add(tag_Indent);
7085 
7086  m_xAdvance = tag_Indent;
7087  return true;
7088  case 7598483: // </indent>
7089  case 6971027: // </INDENT>
7090  tag_Indent = m_indentStack.Remove();
7091  //m_xAdvance = tag_Indent;
7092  return true;
7093  case 1109386397: // <line-indent>
7094  case -842656867: // <LINE-INDENT>
7095  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7096  if (value == -9999) return false;
7097 
7098  switch (tagUnitType)
7099  {
7100  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7101  tag_LineIndent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7102  break;
7103  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7104  tag_LineIndent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7105  break;
7106  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7107  tag_LineIndent = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
7108  break;
7109  }
7110 
7111  m_xAdvance += tag_LineIndent;
7112  return true;
7113  case -445537194: // </line-indent>
7114  case 1897386838: // </LINE-INDENT>
7115  tag_LineIndent = 0;
7116  return true;
7117  case 2246877: // <sprite=x>
7118  case 1619421: // <SPRITE>
7119  int spriteAssetHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
7120  TMP_SpriteAsset tempSpriteAsset;
7121  m_spriteIndex = -1;
7122 
7123  // CHECK TAG FORMAT
7124  if (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType == TagValueType.None || m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType == TagValueType.NumericalValue)
7125  {
7126  // No Sprite Asset is assigned to the text object
7127  if (m_spriteAsset != null)
7128  {
7129  m_currentSpriteAsset = m_spriteAsset;
7130  }
7131  else if (m_defaultSpriteAsset != null)
7132  {
7133  m_currentSpriteAsset = m_defaultSpriteAsset;
7134  }
7135  else if (m_defaultSpriteAsset == null)
7136  {
7137  if (TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset != null)
7138  m_defaultSpriteAsset = TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset;
7139  else
7140  m_defaultSpriteAsset = Resources.Load<TMP_SpriteAsset>("Sprite Assets/Default Sprite Asset");
7141 
7142  m_currentSpriteAsset = m_defaultSpriteAsset;
7143  }
7144 
7145  // No valid sprite asset available
7146  if (m_currentSpriteAsset == null)
7147  return false;
7148  }
7149  else
7150  {
7151  // A Sprite Asset has been specified
7152  if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetSpriteAsset(spriteAssetHashCode, out tempSpriteAsset))
7153  {
7154  m_currentSpriteAsset = tempSpriteAsset;
7155  }
7156  else
7157  {
7158  // Load Sprite Asset
7159  if (tempSpriteAsset == null)
7160  {
7161  tempSpriteAsset = Resources.Load<TMP_SpriteAsset>(TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
7162  }
7163 
7164  if (tempSpriteAsset == null)
7165  return false;
7166 
7167  //Debug.Log("Loading & assigning new Sprite Asset: " + tempSpriteAsset.name);
7168  MaterialReferenceManager.AddSpriteAsset(spriteAssetHashCode, tempSpriteAsset);
7169  m_currentSpriteAsset = tempSpriteAsset;
7170  }
7171  }
7172 
7173  // Handling of <sprite=index> legacy tag format.
7174  if (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType == TagValueType.NumericalValue) // <sprite=index>
7175  {
7176  int index = (int)ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7177  if (index == -9999) return false;
7178 
7179  // Check to make sure sprite index is valid
7180  if (index > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable.Count - 1) return false;
7181 
7182  m_spriteIndex = index;
7183  }
7184 
7185  m_spriteColor = s_colorWhite;
7186  m_tintSprite = false;
7187 
7188  // Handle Sprite Tag Attributes
7189  for (int i = 0; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
7190  {
7191  //Debug.Log("Attribute[" + i + "].nameHashCode=" + m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode + " Value:" + ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength));
7192  int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
7193  int index = 0;
7194 
7195  switch (nameHashCode)
7196  {
7197  case 43347: // <sprite name="">
7198  case 30547: // <SPRITE NAME="">
7199  m_currentSpriteAsset = TMP_SpriteAsset.SearchForSpriteByHashCode(m_currentSpriteAsset, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueHashCode, true, out index);
7200  if (index == -1) return false;
7201 
7202  m_spriteIndex = index;
7203  break;
7204  case 295562: // <sprite index=>
7205  case 205930: // <SPRITE INDEX=>
7206  index = (int)ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
7207  if (index == -9999) return false;
7208 
7209  // Check to make sure sprite index is valid
7210  if (index > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable.Count - 1) return false;
7211 
7212  m_spriteIndex = index;
7213  break;
7214  case 45819: // tint
7215  case 33019: // TINT
7216  m_tintSprite = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength) != 0;
7217  break;
7218  case 281955: // color=#FF00FF80
7219  case 192323: // COLOR
7220  m_spriteColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
7221  break;
7222  case 39505: // anim="0,16,12" start, end, fps
7223  case 26705: // ANIM
7224  //Debug.Log("Start: " + m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex + " Length: " + m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
7225  int paramCount = GetAttributeParameters(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength, ref m_attributeParameterValues);
7226  if (paramCount != 3) return false;
7227 
7228  m_spriteIndex = (int)m_attributeParameterValues[0];
7229 
7230  if (m_isParsingText)
7231  {
7232  // TODO : fix this!
7233  //if (m_attributeParameterValues[0] > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteInfoList.Count - 1 || m_attributeParameterValues[1] > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteInfoList.Count - 1)
7234  // return false;
7235 
7236  spriteAnimator.DoSpriteAnimation(m_characterCount, m_currentSpriteAsset, m_spriteIndex, (int)m_attributeParameterValues[1], (int)m_attributeParameterValues[2]);
7237  }
7238 
7239  break;
7240  //case 45545: // size
7241  //case 32745: // SIZE
7242 
7243  // break;
7244  default:
7245  if (nameHashCode != 2246877 && nameHashCode != 1619421)
7246  return false;
7247  break;
7248  }
7249  }
7250 
7251  if (m_spriteIndex == -1) return false;
7252 
7253  // Material HashCode for the Sprite Asset is the Sprite Asset Hash Code
7254  m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentSpriteAsset.material, m_currentSpriteAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
7255 
7256  m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
7257  return true;
7258  case 730022849: // <lowercase>
7259  case 514803617: // <LOWERCASE>
7260  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.LowerCase;
7261  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.LowerCase);
7262  return true;
7263  case -1668324918: // </lowercase>
7264  case -1883544150: // </LOWERCASE>
7265  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.LowerCase) != FontStyles.LowerCase)
7266  {
7267  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.LowerCase) == 0)
7268  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.LowerCase;
7269  }
7270  return true;
7271  case 13526026: // <allcaps>
7272  case 9133802: // <ALLCAPS>
7273  case 781906058: // <uppercase>
7274  case 566686826: // <UPPERCASE>
7275  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.UpperCase;
7276  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.UpperCase);
7277  return true;
7278  case 52232547: // </allcaps>
7279  case 47840323: // </ALLCAPS>
7280  case -1616441709: // </uppercase>
7281  case -1831660941: // </UPPERCASE>
7282  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.UpperCase) != FontStyles.UpperCase)
7283  {
7284  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.UpperCase) == 0)
7285  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.UpperCase;
7286  }
7287  return true;
7288  case 766244328: // <smallcaps>
7289  case 551025096: // <SMALLCAPS>
7290  m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.SmallCaps;
7291  m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.SmallCaps);
7292  return true;
7293  case -1632103439: // </smallcaps>
7294  case -1847322671: // </SMALLCAPS>
7295  if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.SmallCaps) != FontStyles.SmallCaps)
7296  {
7297  if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.SmallCaps) == 0)
7298  m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.SmallCaps;
7299  }
7300  return true;
7301  case 2109854: // <margin=00.0> <margin=00em> <margin=50%>
7302  case 1482398: // <MARGIN>
7303  // Check value type
7304  switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType)
7305  {
7306  case TagValueType.NumericalValue:
7307  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength); // px
7308  if (value == -9999) return false;
7309 
7310  // Determine tag unit type
7311  switch (tagUnitType)
7312  {
7313  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7314  m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7315  break;
7316  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7317  m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7318  break;
7319  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7320  m_marginLeft = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
7321  break;
7322  }
7323  m_marginLeft = m_marginLeft >= 0 ? m_marginLeft : 0;
7324  m_marginRight = m_marginLeft;
7325  return true;
7326 
7327  case TagValueType.None:
7328  for (int i = 1; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
7329  {
7330  // Get attribute name
7331  int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
7332 
7333  switch (nameHashCode)
7334  {
7335  case 42823: // <margin left=value>
7336  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength); // px
7337  if (value == -9999) return false;
7338 
7339  switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].unitType)
7340  {
7341  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7342  m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7343  break;
7344  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7345  m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7346  break;
7347  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7348  m_marginLeft = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
7349  break;
7350  }
7351  m_marginLeft = m_marginLeft >= 0 ? m_marginLeft : 0;
7352  break;
7353 
7354  case 315620: // <margin right=value>
7355  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength); // px
7356  if (value == -9999) return false;
7357 
7358  switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].unitType)
7359  {
7360  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7361  m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7362  break;
7363  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7364  m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7365  break;
7366  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7367  m_marginRight = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
7368  break;
7369  }
7370  m_marginRight = m_marginRight >= 0 ? m_marginRight : 0;
7371  break;
7372  }
7373  }
7374  return true;
7375  }
7376 
7377  return false;
7378  case 7639357: // </margin>
7379  case 7011901: // </MARGIN>
7380  m_marginLeft = 0;
7381  m_marginRight = 0;
7382  return true;
7383  case 1100728678: // <margin-left=xx.x>
7384  case -855002522: // <MARGIN-LEFT>
7385  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength); // px
7386  if (value == -9999) return false;
7387 
7388  switch (tagUnitType)
7389  {
7390  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7391  m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7392  break;
7393  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7394  m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7395  break;
7396  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7397  m_marginLeft = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
7398  break;
7399  }
7400  m_marginLeft = m_marginLeft >= 0 ? m_marginLeft : 0;
7401  return true;
7402  case -884817987: // <margin-right=xx.x>
7403  case -1690034531: // <MARGIN-RIGHT>
7404  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength); // px
7405  if (value == -9999) return false;
7406 
7407  switch (tagUnitType)
7408  {
7409  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7410  m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7411  break;
7412  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7413  m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7414  break;
7415  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7416  m_marginRight = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
7417  break;
7418  }
7419  m_marginRight = m_marginRight >= 0 ? m_marginRight : 0;
7420  return true;
7421  case 1109349752: // <line-height=xx.x>
7422  case -842693512: // <LINE-HEIGHT>
7423  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7424  if (value == -9999 || value == 0) return false;
7425 
7426  switch (tagUnitType)
7427  {
7428  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7429  m_lineHeight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
7430  break;
7431  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7432  m_lineHeight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
7433  break;
7434  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7435  m_lineHeight = m_fontAsset.faceInfo.lineHeight * value / 100 * m_fontScale;
7436  break;
7437  }
7438  return true;
7439  case -445573839: // </line-height>
7440  case 1897350193: // </LINE-HEIGHT>
7441  m_lineHeight = TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET;
7442  return true;
7443  case 15115642: // <noparse>
7444  case 10723418: // <NOPARSE>
7445  tag_NoParsing = true;
7446  return true;
7447  case 1913798: // <action>
7448  case 1286342: // <ACTION>
7449  int actionID = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
7450 
7451  if (m_isParsingText)
7452  {
7453  m_actionStack.Add(actionID);
7454 
7455  Debug.Log("Action ID: [" + actionID + "] First character index: " + m_characterCount);
7456 
7457 
7458  }
7459  //if (m_isParsingText)
7460  //{
7461  // TMP_Action action = TMP_Action.GetAction(m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode);
7462  //}
7463  return true;
7464  case 7443301: // </action>
7465  case 6815845: // </ACTION>
7466  if (m_isParsingText)
7467  {
7468  Debug.Log("Action ID: [" + m_actionStack.CurrentItem() + "] Last character index: " + (m_characterCount - 1));
7469  }
7470 
7471  m_actionStack.Remove();
7472  return true;
7473  case 315682: // <scale=xx.x>
7474  case 226050: // <SCALE=xx.x>
7475  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7476  if (value == -9999) return false;
7477 
7478  m_FXMatrix = Matrix4x4.TRS(Vector3.zero, Quaternion.identity, new Vector3(value, 1, 1));
7479  m_isFXMatrixSet = true;
7480 
7481  return true;
7482  case 1105611: // </scale>
7483  case 1015979: // </SCALE>
7484  m_isFXMatrixSet = false;
7485  return true;
7486  case 2227963: // <rotate=xx.x>
7487  case 1600507: // <ROTATE=xx.x>
7488  // TODO: Add ability to use Random Rotation
7489 
7490  value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
7491  if (value == -9999) return false;
7492 
7493  m_FXMatrix = Matrix4x4.TRS(Vector3.zero, Quaternion.Euler(0, 0, value), Vector3.one);
7494  m_isFXMatrixSet = true;
7495 
7496  return true;
7497  case 7757466: // </rotate>
7498  case 7130010: // </ROTATE>
7499  m_isFXMatrixSet = false;
7500  return true;
7501  case 317446: // <table>
7502  case 227814: // <TABLE>
7503  switch (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode)
7504  {
7505  case 327550: // width
7506  float tableWidth = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
7507 
7508  switch (tagUnitType)
7509  {
7510  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7511  Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "px.");
7512  break;
7513  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7514  Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "em.");
7515  break;
7516  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7517  Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "%.");
7518  break;
7519  }
7520  break;
7521  }
7522  return true;
7523  case 1107375: // </table>
7524  case 1017743: // </TABLE>
7525  return true;
7526  case 926: // <tr>
7527  case 670: // <TR>
7528  return true;
7529  case 3229: // </tr>
7530  case 2973: // </TR>
7531  return true;
7532  case 916: // <th>
7533  case 660: // <TH>
7534  // Set style to bold and center alignment
7535  return true;
7536  case 3219: // </th>
7537  case 2963: // </TH>
7538  return true;
7539  case 912: // <td>
7540  case 656: // <TD>
7541  // Style options
7542  for (int i = 1; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
7543  {
7544  switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode)
7545  {
7546  case 327550: // width
7547  float tableWidth = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
7548 
7549  switch (tagUnitType)
7550  {
7551  case TagUnitType.Pixels:
7552  Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "px.");
7553  break;
7554  case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
7555  Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "em.");
7556  break;
7557  case TagUnitType.Percentage:
7558  Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "%.");
7559  break;
7560  }
7561  break;
7562  case 275917: // align
7563  switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].valueHashCode)
7564  {
7565  case 3774683: // left
7566  Debug.Log("TD align=\"left\".");
7567  break;
7568  case 136703040: // right
7569  Debug.Log("TD align=\"right\".");
7570  break;
7571  case -458210101: // center
7572  Debug.Log("TD align=\"center\".");
7573  break;
7574  case -523808257: // justified
7575  Debug.Log("TD align=\"justified\".");
7576  break;
7577  }
7578  break;
7579  }
7580  }
7581 
7582  return true;
7583  case 3215: // </td>
7584  case 2959: // </TD>
7585  return true;
7586  }
7587  }
7588  #endif
7589  #endregion
7590 
7591  return false;
7592  }
7593  }
7594 }
